column3: A large seabird with very long, narrow wings; much larger than shearwaters and petrels. Unmistakable with white body, dingy pinkish bill, and dark markings on underwing. Fairly common offshore throughout North Pacific, as far north as the Bering Sea. Occasionally seen from shore. Breeds mainly in Hawaii, where it is often confiding and unafraid of humans. Nests on the ground in coastal areas of Kauai and northern Oahu; abundant in the Northwestern Hawaiian Islands. Smaller colonies also exist off Japan and Mexico. Calls include whinnying, low cow-like “moo,” soft grunts, and squeals. Also claps bill.
column4: 一种翅膀很长很窄的大型海鸟;比海鸥和海燕大得多。白色的身体，暗淡的粉红色的喙，翅膀下有深色的斑纹。在北太平洋沿岸相当常见，北至白令海。偶尔从岸上看到。主要在夏威夷繁殖，在那里它通常是信任和不怕人类。在考艾岛和瓦胡岛北部沿海地区的地面筑巢;在夏威夷群岛西北部丰富。日本和墨西哥附近也有较小的殖民地。叫声包括呜咽，像牛一样低的“哞”，柔和的咕噜声和尖叫声。也为比尔鼓掌。

column3: A beautiful smoky-brown albatross with bright white eye crescents and an orange line running down the bill that gives this otherwise regal bird a goofy appearance. Unlike the otherwise similar Light-mantled Albatross, the present species’ dark head does not contrast with the rest of the body. Also note Light-mantled’s less obvious blue-gray bill line. Dark morph giant-petrels can be similar at a glance, but have larger, bulbous pink bills, and average more long-necked and hunch-backed in appearance. A pelagic species, ranging throughout much of the southern Atlantic and Indian Oceans. Nests on a handful of islands in that region, favoring areas with steep rocky slopes and tussock grass.
column4: 一只美丽的烟棕色信天翁，明亮的白色月牙眼，喙上有一条橙色的线条，这使这种原本威严的鸟看起来很傻。与其他类似的轻羽信天翁不同，现在的信天翁深色的头部与身体的其他部分没有对比。也要注意光罩的不太明显的蓝灰色喙线。乍一看，深色巨海燕很相似，但它们有更大的球状粉红色喙，平均脖子更长，背部驼背。一种远洋物种，分布在南大西洋和印度洋的大部分地区。在该地区的少数岛屿上筑巢，喜欢陡峭的岩石斜坡和草丛。

column3: Anis are bizarre, coal-black cuckoos with long floppy tails and unique, curiously tall, flattened bills. Groove-billed occurs in a variety of open and semi-open habitats in tropical lowlands and foothills, typically staying low in shrubs and grasses. Gregarious and not particularly graceful; usually seen crashing around awkwardly in small groups. Flies with choppy wingbeats and long glides. Widespread and common throughout Middle America, as far north as Texas. In South America, primarily occurs west of the Andes; also in inter-Andean valleys and lowlands of northern Colombia and Venezuela. Compare with the very similar Smooth-billed Ani, which overlaps locally. Note especially the bill shape: Groove-billed typically has a lower, more evenly rounded top edge to the bill without an obvious keel, and the lower edge of the bill is straighter. Grooves are distinctive but can be difficult to see. Voice is also important: listen for a sharp “PIT!-tooee” and other sharp clicks and whistles.
column4: 沟嘴鸟是一种奇怪的煤黑色杜鹃，长着柔软的长尾和独特的、高而扁平的喙。沟嘴鸟出现在热带低地和山麓的各种开放和半开放的栖息地，通常停留在低矮的灌木和草丛中。群居的，不特别优雅的;通常在小群中笨拙地乱撞。翅膀拍动起伏，滑翔时间长。广泛分布于美国中部，北至德克萨斯州。在南美洲，主要发生在安第斯山脉以西;也生长在安第斯山脉间的山谷和哥伦比亚北部和委内瑞拉的低地。与非常相似的光滑嘴阿尼相比，它们在局部重叠。特别注意嘴的形状:凹槽嘴通常有一个较低的，更均匀的圆形上边缘到嘴没有明显的龙骨，和嘴的下边缘更直。凹槽是独特的，但很难看到。声音也很重要:听一个尖锐的“PIT!”还有其他尖锐的咔哒声和哨声。

column3: Dumpy, dark alcid with pale eyes; very small, only slightly larger than a sparrow. Note the thin white “whiskers” trailing backwards from behind each eye. Breeding birds are dark gray-black overall, with a droopy forward-arching crest and a bright orange bill with an uptilted gape which gives them a maniacally grinning appearance. Non-breeding adults and immatures are duller, with a smaller, darker bill and the barest hints of a crest. Breeds in immense colonies on remote rocky islands and forages out at sea. Very vocal at colonies, but also gives occasional yapping barks when out foraging in groups.
column4: 矮胖的，黑酸的，苍白的眼睛;非常小，只比麻雀稍大一点。注意从每只眼睛后面向后延伸的细细的白色“胡须”。繁殖的鸟整体呈深灰黑色，有下垂的前拱冠，亮橙色的喙上有一个向上倾斜的口，使它们看起来像在疯狂地笑。非繁殖期的成年和未成熟的是暗淡的，有一个更小，更暗的喙和最裸露的冠。在遥远的岩石岛屿上大量繁殖，在海上觅食。在群体中非常爱说话，但在集体外出觅食时偶尔也会发出吠叫。

column3: An abundant tiny auklet, only slightly larger than a sparrow. Occurs in large colonies around rocky shores during summer, and in smaller flocks further from the coast during winter. Summer plumage appears messy with numerous gray spots around the belly. Winter plumage is more contrastingly marked with flashing white belly and shoulders. Gives frequent, consistent squawks and squeaks at colonies. Readily separable from other auklets due to its whiter plumage and smaller size.
column4: 数量众多的小海雀，只比麻雀稍大。夏季在岩石海岸附近的大群中出现，冬季在远离海岸的小群中出现。夏季的羽毛看起来凌乱，腹部周围有许多灰色斑点。冬季的羽毛则有鲜明的白色腹部和肩部。在蜂群里发出频繁的、持续的吱吱声。很容易从其他小海雀中分离出来，因为它的羽毛更白，体型更小。

column3: Dumpy, medium-sized alcid with a bright orange bill. Pale button eye and upturned gape give it a distinctly maniacal, smiling appearance. Blackish above and white below, with a long white “whisker” extending down from behind the eye in breeding season; in wintering birds, white extends up onto the throat. Clean white belly distinguishes this species from other similar auklets. Least Auklet has a similar color scheme but is half the size, has white cheeks in non-breeding plumage, and has white-mottled upperparts when breeding. Parakeet Auklet breeds on offshore island colonies, often with other auklet species; it winters offshore.
column4: 矮胖的，中等大小的酸，有亮橙色的嘴。苍白的纽扣眼和上翘的嘴巴给了它一种明显的疯狂、微笑的样子。上面黑色，下面白色，在繁殖季节，有长长的白色“须”从眼睛后面延伸下来;在越冬的鸟类中，白色一直延伸到喉咙。干净的白色腹部使这个物种与其他类似的小海雀区别开来。最小的小海雀有相似的配色方案，但只有一半大小，在非繁殖羽毛中有白色的脸颊，在繁殖时有白色斑驳的上半身。长尾小海雀在近海岛屿上繁殖，通常与其他小海雀物种在一起;它在近海过冬。

column3: Gray seabird shaped like a football. Breeding plumage shows white belly and thin white eyebrow and mustache. Distinctive stout orange bill with pale vertical protrusion at base. Nonbreeding birds have a plainer face and lack "horn" on bill; juveniles have gray bill. Longer bill than other auklets with a flatter head. Breeds on offshore islands; otherwise found at sea, usually alone. Dives underwater for fish.
column4: 形状像足球的灰色海鸟。繁殖羽毛呈白色腹部，细白色眉毛和小胡子。独特的粗壮的桔黄色喙，基部有苍白的垂直突起。非繁殖期的鸟有一个简单的脸和缺乏“角”的喙;幼鸟的喙是灰色的。喙比其他小海雀长，头部较平。在近海岛屿上的品种;否则在海上发现，通常是单独的。潜入水下捕鱼。

column3: Breeding males are glossy black with purplish head and greenish sheen on body. Nonbreeding males have pale eyebrows and staring yellow eye. Females are plain dark brown and typically have dark eyes. Forages by walking on ground. Sometimes in mixed flocks with other blackbirds at feedlots. Also, walks along parking lots, golf courses, or roadsides. Females similar to Brown-headed Cowbird, but with longer, thinner bill and longer tail than cowbird.
column4: 繁殖的雄性是有光泽的黑色，头部略带紫色，身体有绿色光泽。不能繁殖的雄性有苍白的眉毛和瞪大的黄眼睛。雌性是普通的深棕色，通常有黑色的眼睛。在地面上行走觅食。有时在饲养场与其他黑鸟混在一起。也可以沿着停车场、高尔夫球场或路边散步。雌性与棕头牛头鸟相似，但比牛头鸟的喙更长，更细，尾巴更长。

column3: 红翅黑鹂，北美大陆数量最多的鸟类之一。个头大致是麻雀的两倍大，鸽子的一半大。体型比较敦实，标志性特征是橙红镶黄边的肩章。此肩章的大小和亮丽程度是他们吸引雌性以及驱赶雄性的重要指标。红翅黑鹂喜欢开阔的湿地，主要以昆虫为食，也吃一些谷物，种籽。雌性红翅黑鹂将巢筑于接近地面的灌木丛中，或者接近水面的沼泽从中。因为红翅黑鹂族群数量与亚种的不同，研究发现它们受到环境的影响胜过基因对其的影响，具体体现在将它们被人为的挪窝更换父母后，其与继父继母的相似度更高。
column4: 红翅黑鹂，北美大陆数量最多的鸟类之一。个头大致是麻雀的两倍大，鸽子的一半大。体型比较敦实，标志性特征是橙红镶黄边的肩章。此肩章的大小和亮丽程度是他们吸引雌性以及驱赶雄性的重要指标。红翅黑鹂喜欢开阔的湿地，主要以昆虫为食，也吃一些谷物，种籽。雌性红翅黑鹂将巢筑于接近地面的灌木丛中，或者接近水面的沼泽从中。因为红翅黑鹂族群数量与亚种的不同，研究发现它们受到环境的影响胜过基因对其的影响，具体体现在将它们被人为的挪窝更换父母后，其与继父继母的相似度更高。

column3: Rusty edges to feathers and pale eyebrow in winter contrast with blackish feather bases. Breeding males are glossy black. Shorter tail than Common Grackle. Thinner bill than Red-winged Blackbird. Found in wooded swamps. Often in flocks; frequently mixes with Red-winged Blackbirds and Common Grackle in winter. Look for flocks perched at tops of trees bordering marshes and listen for their calls to help pick them out from large flocks of blackbirds.
column4: 生锈的边缘到羽毛和苍白的眉毛在冬天与黑色的羽毛基部形成对比。繁殖期的雄性是光滑的黑色。尾巴比普通白嘴鸦短。嘴比红翼黑鸟细。在树木繁茂的沼泽中发现。通常成群的;冬季常与红翅黑鹂和白头翁混居。寻找栖息在靠近沼泽的树梢上的鸟群，倾听它们的叫声，帮助它们从一大群黑鸟中脱颖而出。

column3: Stunning and unmistakable blackbird of western North America. Males are black with a golden-yellow head and white patch on the wing. Females are all dark brown with messy yellow on the head and breast. Breeds in marshes, where males sing a grating, mechanical song. Winters in large flocks, mainly in Mexico. Often mixes with other species of blackbird. Forages in open areas, sometimes on barren dirt or in fields.
column4: 北美西部令人惊叹的黑鸟。雄性为黑色，头部为金黄色，翅膀上有白色斑点。雌性都是深棕色，头部和胸部是凌乱的黄色。在沼泽中繁殖，雄性会发出刺耳的机械叫声。冬季大群繁殖，主要分布在墨西哥。常与其他种类的黑鸟混在一起。在开阔的地方，有时在贫瘠的土地上或田野里觅食。

column3: Breeding male is distinctive with black body, white rump, and creamy nape. Females and nonbreeders are drastically different, yellow-brown with fine streaking on breast sides, and stripes on head. Smaller than Red-winged Blackbird with shorter bill. Spiky tail feathers. In the blackbird family, although often mistaken as a sparrow. Breeds in open fields. Listen for male's bubbly song. Often in flocks during fall migration; departs early for wintering grounds in South America.
column4: 繁殖雄性的特点是黑色的身体，白色的臀部和奶油色的颈。雌性和非繁殖者是完全不同的，黄棕色，胸部两侧有细条纹，头部有条纹。比红翅黑鹂小，喙短。尖尖的尾羽。在黑鸟科，虽然经常被误认为是麻雀。在开阔的田野里繁殖。听男性欢快的歌声。常在秋季迁徙时成群结队;提早启程前往南美的越冬地。

column3: Breeding males are entirely blue with a slightly darker head. Females are plain brown with a whitish throat, bluish tail, and faint streaks on the underparts. Breeds in shrubby areas at the edge of forests and fields. Males often sing from a high exposed perch. Winters mainly in Middle America and the Caribbean, where it frequently gathers in flocks in weedy fields. Females can be very difficult to distinguish from Lazuli Bunting, although their range doesn't overlap much. Indigo usually shows more streaking on the underparts; also note fainter wingbars, duller breast, and more contrasting whitish throat.
column4: 繁殖期的雄性全身为蓝色，头部略深。雌性是纯棕色的，喉咙是白色的，尾巴是蓝色的，腹部有微弱的条纹。在森林和田野边缘的灌木地区繁殖。雄企鹅经常在高暴露的栖木上唱歌。冬季主要分布在中美洲和加勒比海地区，经常在杂草丛生的田野里成群聚集。虽然它们的活动范围并没有太多重叠，但很难将雌性与Lazuli Bunting区分开来。靛蓝通常在腹部显示更多的条纹;同时注意翼条变暗，胸部变暗，喉咙变白。

column3: Breeding males are unmistakable: bright cerulean above with bold white wingbars, white belly, and orange breast. Females are plain buffy brown with paler wingbars and slightly brighter orangey breast. Breeds on shrubby hillsides and other semiopen habitats in western North America. Males often sing from a high exposed perch. Winters mainly in Mexico, where it frequently gathers in flocks in weedy fields. Females can be very difficult to distinguish from Indigo Bunting, although their range doesn't overlap much. Lazuli never shows streaks below like female Indigo Bunting often does; also note bolder wingbars, brighter breast, and less contrasting pale throat.
column4: 繁殖期的雄性是很明显的:明亮的天蓝色，大胆的白色翼条，白色的腹部和橙色的乳房。雌性是普通的灰褐色，翼条较浅，胸部略亮的橙色。在北美西部灌木丛生的山坡和其他半开放的栖息地繁殖。雄企鹅经常在高暴露的栖木上唱歌。冬季主要在墨西哥，在那里它经常成群聚集在杂草丛生的田地里。虽然它们的活动范围不太重叠，但很难将雌性与靛蓝斑羚区分开来。天青石从不像雌性靛蓝c那样在下面显示条纹;同时注意更粗的翼杆，更亮的胸部，对比更淡的喉咙。

column3: Incomparably beautiful songbird in which adult males are almost too colorful, with a jarring combination of rich blue head, bright red underparts, and lime green back. Females and immature males are plain green and unstreaked, not brown-toned like other buntings. Breeds in shrubby fields and forest edges, where males often sing from a high exposed perch. Found in a variety of weedy or thickety habitats in winter, often in small flocks that like to stay low and hidden. Sometimes visits feeders. Two disjunct populations look and sound very similar, but have different migration routes. Eastern birds, mainly breeding in Georgia and South Carolina, just migrate south to Florida and the Caribbean for the winter. Larger western population centered in Texas migrates to western Mexico and then filters south through Central America.
column4: 无比美丽的鸣禽，成年雄鸟几乎色彩斑斓，有着丰富的蓝色头部，鲜红色的腹部和酸橙绿色的背部。雌性和未成熟的雄性是纯绿色的，没有条纹，不像其他猎禽那样是棕色的。在灌木丛生的田野和森林边缘繁殖，雄性经常在高暴露的栖木上唱歌。冬天在各种杂草丛生或浓密的栖息地发现，经常小群地栖息，它们喜欢保持低矮和隐蔽。有时拜访喂食者。两个分离的种群看起来和听起来都很相似，但迁徙路线不同。东部的鸟类，主要在乔治亚州和南卡罗来纳繁殖，只是向南迁徙到佛罗里达和加勒比海过冬。以德克萨斯州为中心的较大西部人口迁移到墨西哥西部，然后通过中美洲向南过滤。

column3: 北美红雀是北美洲最绚丽的鸟之一，长着穗状的冠和鲜红色的艳丽羽毛。和大部分鸣禽不同，雌北美红雀和雄北美红雀都唱歌，而且数年保持同一种唱腔。北美红雀主要栖息在林区、灌木丛和公园里。它们吃昆虫和植物种子，在冬天也常光顾其他鸟的餐桌。在最近的100年里，北美红雀的活动范围在逐渐北扩。
column4: 北美红雀是北美洲最绚丽的鸟之一，长着穗状的冠和鲜红色的艳丽羽毛。和大部分鸣禽不同，雌北美红雀和雄北美红雀都唱歌，而且数年保持同一种唱腔。北美红雀主要栖息在林区、灌木丛和公园里。它们吃昆虫和植物种子，在冬天也常光顾其他鸟的餐桌。在最近的100年里，北美红雀的活动范围在逐渐北扩。

column3: Chunky rainforest bird with emerald green upperparts, black spot below the dark red eye, and green-olive underparts with extensive pale spotting. Inhabits the Wet Tropics of northern Queensland (Cairns region), thus does not overlap with similar Green Catbird. Forages mostly in middle and upper story of the rainforest. Compare female and juvenile Satin Bowerbird (with blue eye, darker bill). Spotted Catbird is well known for its characteristic catlike yowling call.
column4: 粗壮的热带雨林鸟，上肢翠绿色，暗红色眼睛下方有黑色斑点，下肢绿橄榄色，有广泛的白色斑点。栖息在昆士兰北部的潮湿热带地区(凯恩斯地区)，因此不与类似的绿猫鸟重叠。主要在雨林的中层和上层觅食。比较雌性和幼年缎面园丁鸟(蓝眼睛，深色喙)。斑点猫鸟以其特有的猫叫声而闻名。

column3: Medium-sized songbird, smaller than a robin, with a smooth gray body, black cap, and rusty-red undertail. Sometimes mimics other species in complex, jumbled song. Prefers dense shrubs and small trees in forest edges, streamside thickets, and old fields. Occasionally feeds on suet.
column4: 中等大小的鸣禽，比知更鸟小，光滑的灰色身体，黑色的帽檐，铁锈红色的下尾。有时会模仿其他物种发出复杂而混乱的歌声。喜欢浓密的灌木和小树在森林边缘，河边的灌丛，和老田野。偶尔吃糖。

column3: Strange, long-tailed tanager-like bird with thick bill. Once thought to be a warbler, but now considered unique in its own family. Bright yellow throat and breast, contrasting white spectacles, and dull olive-green upperparts. Known for its skulking habits. Often difficult to see in dense thickets, shrubby areas, and field edges. In breeding season, however, males can sit on conspicuous perches to sing and even perform a flight display. Fairly widespread but typically uncommon across much of the U.S. and Mexico, wintering to Costa Rica. Song is variable series of slow whistles, hoots, and chatters. Feeds mainly on insects; also fruit in winter.
column4: 奇怪的，长尾的，像tanager一样的鸟，喙很厚。曾经被认为是莺，但现在被认为是其家族中独一无二的。亮黄色的喉部和胸部，对比鲜明的白色眼镜和暗淡的橄榄绿上半身。以其狡猾的习性而闻名。在茂密的灌木丛、灌木地区和田野边缘通常很难看到。然而，在繁殖季节，雄性可以坐在显眼的栖木上唱歌，甚至表演飞行表演。在美国和墨西哥的大部分地区相当普遍，但通常不常见，在哥斯达黎加过冬。歌曲是一系列缓慢的口哨声、鸣叫声和叽叽喳喳声。主要以昆虫为食;冬天也吃水果。

column3: Large, striking, long-tailed sparrow of the eastern U.S. and Canada. Black above with bright rufous sides and a white belly. Eye color varies from white (in the southeastern U.S) to dark red (further north). In flight, note white corners on tail. Also note females are browner than jet-black males. Most similar to Spotted Towhee, but Eastern is mostly black above, only showing single white patch on folded wing. Hybridizes with Spotted Towhee in central U.S. and south-central Canada; hybrids usually show intermediate wing pattern. Inhabits scrubby areas and forest edges with thickets. Forages primarily by hopping along ground, scraping away leaf litter. Males sing from atop shrubs and low trees. Visits feeders.
column4: 美国东部和加拿大的大的、引人注目的长尾麻雀。上面黑色，侧面鲜红，腹部白色。眼睛的颜色从白色(美国东南部)到深红色(更北部)不等。在飞行中，注意尾部的白色角。还要注意的是，女性的肤色比纯黑的男性要深。最类似于斑点拖，但东部大部分是黑色以上，只有在折叠的翅膀上显示单个白色斑块。在美国中部和加拿大中南部与斑点土豆泥杂交;混血儿通常表现为中间翼型。栖息于灌木丛和森林边缘。主要通过在地面上跳跃，刮走落叶来觅食。雄性在灌木和低矮的树上唱歌。访问喂食器。

column3: Large night bird with a remarkably big head. Plumage is variable, ranging from grayish to strikingly rufous, but always intricately patterned. Very similar to Whip-poor-will but larger, longer-winged, and more rufous. Chuck-will’s-widow has less white in the tail than Whip-poor-will, but can be difficult to see. Strictly nocturnal, more often heard than seen. Listen for a loud whistled song calling its name: "chuck-WILL'S-widow." Sometimes found roosting on low branches during the daytime, especially during migration. Found in forests with mix of pines and deciduous trees.
column4: 大型夜鸟，头大得惊人。羽毛是可变的，从灰色到惊人的红褐色，但总是复杂的图案。非常类似于鞭-穷意志，但更大，更长的翅膀，和更多的赤褐色。Chuck-will -widow尾巴上的白色比Whip-poor-will少，但很难看到。严格意义上的夜间活动，听到的比看到的多。听一听响亮的口哨叫着它的名字:“查克・威尔的寡妇。”有时白天栖息在低矮的树枝上，尤其是在迁徙期间。生长在松树和落叶树混合生长的森林中。

column3: Black overall with greenish iridescence on back. Pale buffy feathers at base of bill. Breeding adults have blue skin on throat. Immatures have buffy breast. Strictly coastal. Dives to capture fish. Thicker bill and neck than similar Pelagic Cormorant.
column4: 整体黑色，背部带绿色彩虹色。在喙的基部有淡黄色的羽毛。正在繁殖的成年动物喉咙上有蓝色的皮肤。不成熟的乳房是肉色的。严格的沿海。潜水捕捉鱼。喙和脖子比类似的远洋鸬鹚更厚。

column3: Dark glossy-green cormorant with a bluish neck, red face, and yellowish bill. White patches on sides of rump. Juveniles are duller than adults, especially on the face, but usually show some pale pinkish at the base of the bill. Found on rocky coastlines; breeds in colonies on precarious cliff faces. Range extends from the Kenai Peninsula in Alaska, out the Aleutian and Pribilof Islands to the Kamchatcka Peninsula, and down the Kuril Islands to Hokkaido. Most similar to Pelagic Cormorant but note thicker neck, brighter face, and thicker, paler bill. Feeds on fish.
column4: 深绿色的有光泽的鸬鹚，脖子偏蓝，脸偏红，嘴偏黄。臀部两侧有白色斑块。幼鸟的颜色比成年鸟暗淡，尤其是在面部，但通常在喙的底部显示一些淡粉红色。发现于多岩石的海岸线;在危险的悬崖峭壁上群居繁殖。范围从阿拉斯加的基奈半岛，阿留申群岛和普里比洛夫群岛延伸到堪察加半岛，沿着千岛群岛延伸到北海道。最类似于远洋鸬鹚，但更粗的脖子，明亮的脸，和更厚，更苍白的嘴。以鱼为食。

column3: 水抓~的苗l水B，脖子跟嘴都L。整b黑色。繁殖期的成B靠近腿有白色斑K，^t。基本上只在海岸出F。相似的t面R]i跟嘴^粗，t色更大更明@，冠羽明@。
column4: 水抓~的苗l水B，脖子跟嘴都L。整b黑色。繁殖期的成B靠近腿有白色斑K，^t。基本上只在海岸出F。相似的t面R]i跟嘴^粗，t色更大更明@，冠羽明@。

column3: Dark brown to matte black; males with iridescent bluish wings. Thick neck and heavy bill. Look for vampire-like staring red eye. Males have an incredible display where they puff out a mane of neck feathers and hover in a circle above the female. Found in a variety of open or semi-open areas, including pastures, forest edge, yards, and agricultural areas. Visits feeders. Often in flocks, sometimes with other blackbirds.
column4: 深棕色到哑光黑色;翅膀呈彩虹蓝色的雄鸟。脖子粗，嘴重。寻找吸血鬼般的红眼睛。雄性有一个令人难以置信的展示，它们鼓起脖子上的鬃毛，在雌性上方盘旋。发现于各种开放或半开放的地区，包括牧场、森林边缘、院子和农业地区。访问喂食器。通常成群结队，有时与其他黑鹂在一起。

column3: Common in Caribbean and South America. Found in semiopen and open grassy areas, often associated with livestock. Feeds mainly on the ground, but perches readily in bushes and trees. Male is glossy blue-black overall (often looks simply black). Female is plain grayish-brown overall. Bill shape is the key feature: blackish bill is more slender and pointed than bills of Brown-headed and Bronzed cowbirds. Also note similar but larger Melodious Blackbird, which has longer bill and often flicks its tail.
column4: 常见于加勒比海和南美洲。见于半开放或开放的草地，常与牲畜联系在一起。主要在地面上觅食，但也很容易栖息在灌木丛和树上。雄性整体是光滑的蓝黑色(通常看起来只是黑色)。雌性是普通的灰褐色整体。喙的形状是主要特征:黑色的喙比棕色头和青铜色的鸟的喙更细长和尖。同样值得注意的是，类似但更大的悠扬黑鸟，它的喙更长，经常甩尾巴。

column3: Tiny, cryptic woodland songbird, unique in North America. White below and streaked brown-and-buff above; blends into tree bark very easily. Also note narrow, decurved bill and long tail. In flight, shows a bold buffy wing stripe. When foraging, often starts near the base of a tree trunk, hitches upward in short, jerky motions until it nears the top, then flies to the base of a nearby tree to begin the process again. Found in mature woodland, especially with conifers. Often joins mixed flocks with other songbirds, especially in winter. Listen for high, thin calls and sweet cascading song.
column4: 微小的，隐蔽的林地鸣禽，在北美是独一无二的。下面是白色，上面是褐色和浅黄色的条纹;很容易与树皮混合。也注意窄，弯曲的嘴和长尾巴。飞行时，翅膀上有一条醒目的淡黄色条纹。觅食时，通常从树干底部附近开始，以短暂而不稳定的动作向上跳跃，直到接近树干顶部，然后飞到附近一棵树的底部，再次开始这个过程。在成熟林地中发现的，尤指针叶树常与其他鸣禽混居在一起，尤其是在冬天。倾听高而细的呼唤和甜美的层叠之歌。

column3: This is the common crow over much of the U.S. and Canada. Most easily identified by voice, a familiar “caw,” often repeated. Common in any open habitats, including fields, open woodlands, marshes, and cities, thriving around humans. Very social, usually seen in flocks, sometimes numbering in the hundreds or even thousands. Aggressive, sometimes seen chasing away hawks and owls. Separated from ravens by smaller size, smaller bill, shorter tail, and shorter, broader wings. Compare with Fish Crow, which is extremely similar in appearance, and best separated by voice. Includes the species formerly known as Northwestern Crow.
column4: 这是美国和加拿大大部分地区常见的乌鸦。最容易通过声音识别，一种熟悉的“叫声”，经常重复。常见于任何开阔的栖息地，包括田野、开阔的林地、沼泽和城市，在人类周围繁衍生息。群居性很强，通常成群结队，有时成百上千。好斗，有时会驱赶鹰和猫头鹰。体型更小，嘴更小，尾巴更短，翅膀更短，更宽，与渡鸦不同。与鱼鸦相比，它们在外观上极其相似，最好通过声音来区分。包括以前被称为西北乌鸦的物种。

column3: A relatively small, glossy crow. Very difficult to separate from American Crow by appearance; look for Fish Crow’s slightly more tapered wings, quicker wingbeats, and shorter legs. Most easily identified by voice, a nasal “eh-uh” or single nasal caws. Mostly restricted to the southeastern U.S., especially along the coast, but range expanding slightly northward and inland in recent years. Often near water, but also seems especially fond of fast-food parking lots and dumpsters.
column4: 乌鸦一种相对较小的、有光泽的乌鸦从外表上很难与美洲乌鸦区分开;寻找鱼乌鸦稍微变细的翅膀，更快的振翅和更短的腿。最容易通过声音识别，一个鼻音“eh-uh”或一个鼻鸣。主要分布在美国东南部，特别是沿海地区，但近年来活动范围向北和内陆略微扩大。经常靠近水边，但似乎也特别喜欢快餐停车场和垃圾箱。

column3: Slender, long-tailed bird more often heard than seen. White below and brown above, with black bill. Separated from Yellow-billed Cuckoo by bill color, uniformly brown outer wings (not rufous) and smaller white spots on underside of tail. Feeds mainly on caterpillars and other insects. Found mostly in deciduous woodlands, especially areas with thick secondary growth. Often sits motionless for long periods of time and is difficult to spot. Listen for its song, a repeated series of soft "cu-cu-cu" notes.
column4: 细长的长尾鸟，常被听到而不是被看到。下面白色，上面棕色，喙部黑色。根据喙的颜色与黄嘴杜鹃区分，外翅均匀地呈棕色(不是棕褐色)，尾侧有较小的白色斑点。主要以毛毛虫和其他昆虫为食。主要生长于落叶林地，尤指次生林茂密的地区。经常长时间坐着不动，很难被发现。倾听它的歌声，一连串重复的柔和的“cu-cu-cu”音符。

column3: Slender, long-tailed bird found in shrubby woodland (especially mangroves). Brown above and buffy below with gray cap, black mask, and bold black-and-white pattern on underside of tail. Bill is black on top, yellow below. Similar to Yellow-billed Cuckoo, but note buffy belly, black mask, and no rufous in the wings. Shy; tends to sit still for long periods of time, can be difficult to spot. Song is a series of low croaking notes, gradually becoming longer and lower-pitched. Feeds primarily on insects and small reptiles.
column4: 生长于灌木林地(尤其是红树林)的细长长尾鸟。上面是棕色，下面是褐色，帽灰色，面罩黑色，尾部下方有醒目的黑白图案。比尔是黑色的上面，黄色的下面。与黄嘴布谷鸟相似，但注意腹部灰褐色，面罩黑色，翅膀上没有红褐色。害羞的;倾向于长时间坐着不动，很难发现。歌曲是一系列低沉的、嘶哑的音符，逐渐变长、变低。主要以昆虫和小型爬行动物为食。

column3: Slender, long-tailed bird that is more often heard than seen. Brown above and white below, with a yellow bill. Look for the large white spots on underside of tail. Wings flash rufous, especially obvious in flight. Stealthy and shy in dense forests and riparian areas, often sitting motionless for long periods of time. Feeds mainly on caterpillars and other insects. Uncommon but widespread breeder across much of North America; more southerly distribution than Black-billed Cuckoo. Winters in South America, where care should be taken to separate from very similar Pearly-breasted Cuckoo, which lacks rufous tones in wing. Separated from Black-billed Cuckoo by bill color, wing color, and tail pattern. Listen for its hoarse cooing song and knocking calls.
column4: 细长、长尾的鸟，常被听到而不常被看到。上面是棕色，下面是白色，喙是黄色的。注意尾巴下面的大白点。翅膀闪着红褐色，在飞行中尤其明显。在茂密的森林和河岸地区隐蔽而害羞，经常长时间一动不动地坐着。主要以毛毛虫和其他昆虫为食。不常见但在北美大部分地区广泛繁殖;比黑嘴杜鹃更偏南分布。南美洲的冬季，在那里应该小心地与非常相似的珍珠胸杜鹃分开，杜鹃在翅膀上没有褐色的音调。根据喙的颜色、翅膀的颜色和尾巴的图案来区分黑嘴杜鹃。听着它嘶哑的咕咕声和敲门声。

column3: The most widespread rosy-finch. Body is the color of milk chocolate. Look for pink highlights in the wings, tail and belly. Several different populations; some have gray wrapping around the back of the head only above the eye, others have entirely gray cheek. Breeds at the highest elevations; descends to lower elevations in winter. Often in mixed flocks in winter with other rosy-finches. Feeds on seeds and insects. Look for them foraging on alpine snowfields. Visits feeders, primarily in winter.
column4: 分布最广的玫瑰雀。身体是牛奶巧克力的颜色。在翅膀、尾巴和腹部寻找粉红色的亮点。几个不同的种群;有些人只在眼睛上方的后脑勺周围有灰色，有些人的脸颊完全是灰色的。在最高海拔的品种;在冬季下降到较低的海拔。通常在冬季与其他玫瑰色雀混合在一起。以种子和昆虫为食。寻找在高山雪原觅食的它们。拜访喂食者，主要在冬天。

column3: Males suffused with raspberry red, especially on head and breast. Compared to House Finch, males lack distinct streaks on sides and are overall more colorful, especially on back and wings. Females and first-year males have contrasty head pattern with pale eyebrow and darker cheek; also note well-defined streaks on sides. Breed in coniferous or mixed forests. Winters in a wider variety of habitats with trees. Visits feeders.
column4: 雄性充满覆盆子红色，特别是在头部和胸部。与家雀相比，雄性在侧面没有明显的条纹，总体上色彩更丰富，尤其是在背部和翅膀上。雌性和第一年的雄性有鲜明的头部图案，浅色的眉毛和深色的脸颊;同时注意两侧有明确的条纹。在针叶林或混交林中繁殖。冬天在各种各样的树木栖息地。访问喂食器。

column3: Large, brownish woodpecker with black barring on the back and black spots on the belly. Easily recognized in flight by its bright white rump. Also note large black crescent-shaped mark on breast. Wings and tail flash yellow or red, depending on the subspecies. Generally "Yellow-shafted" is found in eastern and northern North America, and "Red-shafted" is found in western North America as far south as Oaxaca. Birds from Chiapas to Nicaragua are larger with entirely brown crown, sometimes considered a separate species. Typically singly or in pairs, but can gather in large loose groups during migration and winter. Often seen feeding on the ground in open areas, foraging for ants and worms. Vocal and conspicuous: listen for loud “kleer!” call and series of laughing notes.
column4: 褐色的大型啄木鸟，背部有黑色条纹，腹部有黑色斑点。在飞行中很容易被它明亮的白色臀部认出。在胸部也注意到巨大的黑色新月形标记。翅膀和尾巴闪烁黄色或红色，取决于亚种。通常“黄轴”分布在北美东部和北部，“红轴”分布在北美西部，南至瓦哈卡。从恰帕斯到尼加拉瓜的鸟类体型较大，全棕色的冠，有时被认为是一个单独的物种。通常是单只或成对，但在迁徙和冬季也会成群聚集。经常在开阔的地面上觅食，觅食蚂蚁和蠕虫。大声的和明显的:听响亮的“kleer!”，还有一连串的笑声。

column3: Small flycatcher with big peaked head and relatively long bill. Extremely similar to several other species, especially Alder and Willow Flycatchers. Greenish-olive above and pale whitish below. Note thin white eyering and very long wingtips. Best distinguished from other flycatchers by habitat and voice. Birds near the northern end of breeding range prefer shaded ravines with mix of hemlocks and deciduous trees; farther south, found in mature deciduous forests. Tends to stay high in the canopy. Song is an explosive “pwit-SIP!,” call note is a sharp “pweek!”
column4: 小型捕蝇鸟，头尖大，喙较长。与其他几个种类极为相似，尤其是桤木和柳木捕蝇鸟。上面是绿橄榄色，下面是淡白色。注意白色细眼和非常长的翼尖。最能区别于其他捕蝇鸟的是栖息地和声音。靠近繁殖范围北端的鸟类更喜欢有铁杉和落叶树混合的阴凉峡谷;再往南，产于成熟的落叶林中。倾向于停留在高高的树冠上。歌曲是爆炸性的“pwit-SIP!”， call note是一个尖锐的“pweek!”

column3: Fairly large flycatcher of mature forests. Relatively bright and richly colored for a Myiarchus flycatcher; especially note bright yellow belly, grayish throat and breast, and dull pinkish base to the lower mandible. Most easily identified by voice: listen for loud, rising “queeEEEP” and various rolling, burry calls. Breeds in deciduous forests throughout eastern North America; winters as far south as northern South America. Compare especially with Brown-crested Flycatcher on the wintering grounds
column4: 成熟森林中相当大的捕蝇者。相对明亮和丰富的色彩为Myiarchus捕蝇;特别注意亮黄色的腹部，浅灰色的喉咙和乳房，和暗粉红色的底部到下颌骨。最容易通过声音识别:听响亮的，上升的“吱吱”和各种滚动的，急促的叫声。在整个北美东部的落叶林中繁殖;冬天远至南美洲北部。特别是与越冬地的褐冠捕蝇草相比

column3: Small, grayish-olive flycatcher; very similar to several other species. Look for relatively bold white eyeing, small bill, and frequent wing flicking. Most easily identified by voice: song is a loud “che-BEK, che-BEK” often repeated in bursts. Also gives a short, dry “whit” call. Found in a variety of wooded or shrubby habitats, often near water during breeding season. Typically solitary, often flitting around actively when foraging.
column4: 小的，灰橄榄色的捕蝇草;与其他几种物种非常相似。寻找相对大胆的白色眼睛，小喙，和频繁的轻拍翅膀。最容易识别的声音:歌曲是一个响亮的“che-BEK, che-BEK”经常重复的爆发。也会发出一个简短、干燥的“白色”呼叫。见于各种树木或灌木的栖息地，在繁殖季节常靠近水。典型的独居，觅食时经常活跃地飞来飞去。

column3: Stocky flycatcher that almost always perches conspicuously on a high bare perch with an upright posture. From the front, look for dark sides creating a vest, with a bright white stripe from throat to belly. White patches on the sides of rump are sometimes visible from behind. Most similar to pewees but larger and larger-billed, with more contrasting vest. Feeds on insects. Breeds in clearings and bogs in boreal or mountainous forests, but can be found in migration in open habitats with a mixture of woods and clearings. Distinctive whistled song is often likened to "quick, three beers;" also listen for "pip" call notes.
column4: 结实的捕蝇鸟，几乎总是以直立的姿势显眼地栖息在光秃秃的高处。从正面看，深色的侧面可以做成背心，从颈部到腹部有亮白色条纹。有时从后面可以看到臀部两侧的白色斑块。大多数类似于pewee，但更大，更大的嘴，与更多的对比背心。以昆虫为食。在寒带或山地森林的空地和沼泽中繁殖，但也可以在森林和空地混合的开放栖息地中迁徙。独特的口哨歌曲通常被比作“快，三杯啤酒”;也听“pip”呼叫音符。

column3: Large flycatcher with an extremely long, forked tail. Pale gray overall with darker wings and a salmon-colored wash on the belly. In flight, look for brighter salmon underwings. Juveniles are duller and shorter-tailed than adults, but still distinctive. Breeds in open country of Texas and neighboring states, where it is often seen on fenceposts and utility wires. Winters mainly on the Pacific coast of Mexico and Central America, where it sometimes gathers in large flocks. Might be confused with Fork-tailed Flycatcher in winter range, but note paler plumage with salmon underwings.
column4: 有极长分叉尾巴的大型捕蝇鸟。整体呈浅灰色，翅膀颜色较深，腹部呈鲑鱼色。在飞行中，寻找翅膀下更亮的鲑鱼。幼鱼比成年鱼暗淡，尾巴短，但仍然很有特色。在德克萨斯州和邻近州的开阔地区繁殖，经常在栅栏柱和公用事业电线上看到。冬季主要分布在墨西哥太平洋沿岸和中美洲，有时会聚集成一大群。可能与冬季活动的叉尾捕蝇器混淆，但注意翅膀下有鲑鱼的浅羽毛。

column3: Small, gorgeous flycatcher of open habitats. Adult males have brilliant red underparts and crown with dark brown upperparts and mask behind eye. Females and immature males are much duller grayish-brown, but usually show pink or yellowish color on belly. Widespread; occurs from the southwest U.S. to Argentina. Found in many open woodlands and brushy areas, often seen perched on fence posts along roadsides. Feeds on insects.
column4: 小而华丽的捕蝇鸟，栖息于开阔的生境。成年雄性有亮红色的腹部和冠，深棕色的上部和眼睛后面的面罩。雌性和未成熟的雄性是暗淡的灰褐色，但通常在腹部显示粉红色或黄色。广泛的;发生在美国西南部到阿根廷。在许多开阔的林地和灌木丛中发现，经常栖息在路边的栅栏柱上。以昆虫为食。

column3: Small flycatcher, extremely similar to several other species. Generally shy and inconspicuous; breeds in spruce forests often near boggy areas. Migrants tend to be found in denser wet areas within woods. Olive-greenish above with distinctive yellow wash on throat and belly. Black wings with bold white wingbars. Nearly identical to Western Flycatchers, but limited range overlap. Within range, main confusion species is Least Flycatcher. Bright yellow throat and belly is usually enough to identify Yellow-bellied Flycatcher, but some worn birds can be very similar. Song is similar to Least Flycatcher ("chebek") but more slurred, with a soft buzzy tone. Not frequently repeated like Least Flycatcher. Soft whistled call note, "pwee," unlike Least's sharp "whit" call.
column4: 小型捕蝇鸟，与其他几种非常相似。害羞的:通常害羞且不显眼的;在靠近沼泽地区的云杉林中繁殖。候鸟往往出现在树林里密集潮湿的地方。上面呈橄榄绿，喉咙和腹部有明显的黄色。黑色的翅膀带有醒目的白色翼条。与西方捕蝇鸟几乎相同，但重叠的范围有限。范围内，主要混淆种为捕蝇草。亮黄色的喉咙和腹部通常足以识别黄腹捕蝇鸟，但有些磨损的鸟类可能非常相似。歌曲类似于最少捕蝇者(“chebek”)，但更含糊，带有柔和的嗡嗡声。不像捕蝇手那样经常重复。柔和的口哨叫声，“pwee”，不像最小的尖锐的“whitit”叫声。

column3: 军舰鸟是鹈形目军舰鸟科军舰鸟属鸟类的通称，又称军人鸟。身体较小，腿又短又细，长有钩状嘴；翅膀细长，有很长的叉形尾巴。雄鸟体羽全黑，雌鸟大多数背部、头部和腹部为略带黑色的褐色，而胸部和腋距（一些种类有）为白色。因在海上飞行速度最快，遨游时间最久而得名。野生寿命一般约在15年左右。军舰鸟大多数分布在全球热带和亚热带靠近海岸和岛屿的海域。一般栖息在海岸边树林中。喜群居，常结群在海岛上休息。白天常在海面上飞翔，捕捉水中食物。食物主要以鱼类为主，也吃软体动物和水母。繁殖期在春季和夏季。每窝只产1枚蛋。雌、雄一同筑巢，合力孵蛋及喂养雏鸟。军舰鸟胸肌发达，善于飞翔，素有“飞行冠军”之称，是世界上飞行最快的鸟。此外，其凭着高超的飞行技术，拦路抢劫其他海鸟的捕获物，被戏称为“强盗鸟”。白腹军舰鸟是中国国家一级保护动物。
column4: 军舰鸟是鹈形目军舰鸟科军舰鸟属鸟类的通称，又称军人鸟。身体较小，腿又短又细，长有钩状嘴；翅膀细长，有很长的叉形尾巴。雄鸟体羽全黑，雌鸟大多数背部、头部和腹部为略带黑色的褐色，而胸部和腋距（一些种类有）为白色。因在海上飞行速度最快，遨游时间最久而得名。野生寿命一般约在15年左右。军舰鸟大多数分布在全球热带和亚热带靠近海岸和岛屿的海域。一般栖息在海岸边树林中。喜群居，常结群在海岛上休息。白天常在海面上飞翔，捕捉水中食物。食物主要以鱼类为主，也吃软体动物和水母。繁殖期在春季和夏季。每窝只产1枚蛋。雌、雄一同筑巢，合力孵蛋及喂养雏鸟。军舰鸟胸肌发达，善于飞翔，素有“飞行冠军”之称，是世界上飞行最快的鸟。此外，其凭着高超的飞行技术，拦路抢劫其他海鸟的捕获物，被戏称为“强盗鸟”。白腹军舰鸟是中国国家一级保护动物。

column3: Stocky, medium-sized seabird like a mix between a shearwater and a gull. Variable plumage. Light morph birds are white below and gray above like a gull. Dark morphs are generally sooty-gray overall, darker and browner in the Pacific. All but the darkest birds have a pale patch on the upperwing. Also note thick pale bill with orange tip. Flies with stiff wingbeats, often wheeling and arcing like a shearwater. Can be seen singly or in flocks, often loosely associating with other seabirds when feeding. Breeds on cliffs at high latitudes across the Northern Hemisphere; otherwise found offshore in cold water. Rarely seen from land except at colonies. Atlantic and Pacific populations may be separate species.
column4: 体型粗壮的中型海鸟，介于海鸥和海鸥之间。变量的羽毛。浅变形鸟像海鸥一样，下面是白色，上面是灰色。深色的变种通常是整体的烟灰色，在太平洋更暗和更棕色。除了颜色最黑的鸟外，所有鸟的上翼上都有一块苍白的斑点。也注意到厚的苍白的喙和橙色的尖端。翅膀拍击坚硬的苍蝇，经常像海鸥一样旋转和成弧形。可单独或成群，进食时常与其他海鸟松散地联系在一起。在北半球高纬度地区的悬崖上繁殖;否则会在近海的冷水中发现。很少在陆地上看到，除了在殖民地。大西洋和太平洋的种群可能是不同的物种。

column3: 体型与绿头鸭相同，但喙更细。雄鸟整体灰色，翅膀上有一小块白斑； 头部相比绿头鸭更大、更蓬松。雌鸟与绿头鸭相似；注意其更细的喙，有时可见的白色翼斑，以及喙基的橙色线条。觅食于水面，并会将头没入水中采食水生植物。
column4: 体型与绿头鸭相同，但喙更细。雄鸟整体灰色，翅膀上有一小块白斑； 头部相比绿头鸭更大、更蓬松。雌鸟与绿头鸭相似；注意其更细的喙，有时可见的白色翼斑，以及喙基的橙色线条。觅食于水面，并会将头没入水中采食水生植物。

column3: Small finch. Sharply pointed bill is pink in summer, grayish-brown in winter. Small head, long wings, and short, notched tail. Adult males in spring and summer are bright yellow with black forehead and wings. Females are dull yellow below and olive above with two distinct wingbars. In winter, they are drab, buffy-brown. Active and acrobatic. Sometimes in large numbers at feeders or on ground below. Found in weedy fields, cultivated areas, roadsides, orchards, and backyards.
column4: 小雀。尖尖的喙在夏天呈粉红色，在冬天呈灰褐色。头小，翅膀长，尾巴短，有缺口。春夏两季的成年雄鸟是亮黄色的，额头和翅膀是黑色的。雌鸟下面是暗黄色，上面是橄榄色，有两个明显的翼条。在冬天，它们是灰褐色的。活跃和杂技。有时在喂食处或下面的地面上大量繁殖。常见于杂草丛生的田地、耕地、路边、果园和后院。

column3: Beautiful little finch with a sharp pink bil, cherry-red face, and brilliant black-and-yellow flashes in the wings. Western birds (Europe east to far western Central Asia) have a black-and-white cowl; eastern birds (rest of Central Asia) lack this cowl, and are grayer overall, with more white on the wing. Juvenile (seen in late summer and autumn) has a plain head but is told easily by bold wing pattern. Uses a wide array of wooded and open habitats, from forests and gardens to steppe grasslands and meadows; often feeds on seeding thistles. Forms flocks in autumn and winter, gathering at food sources. Can be inconspicuous, but often detected by pleasant bubbling and twittering calls and song.
column4: 美丽的小雀，有粉红色的喙，樱桃红色的脸，翅膀上有明亮的黑黄相间的闪光。西方鸟类(欧洲东部到中亚西部)有黑白相间的羽冠;东部鸟类(中亚其他地区)没有这种羽冠，总体上是灰色的，翅膀上有更多的白色。幼鱼(见于夏末和秋天)有一个普通的头部，但很容易通过大胆的翅膀图案来识别。使用广泛的树木和开放的栖息地，从森林和花园到草原和草甸;常以蓟种子为食。在秋季和冬季形成鸟群，聚集在食物来源。可能不引人注意，但经常通过愉快的冒泡和叽叽喳喳的叫声和歌声被发现。

column3: Large, lanky blackbird with rounded crown and long tail. Males have ridiculously long tails, almost as long as their body, often held in a V-shape like the keel of boat. Males are glossy black. Females are brown, with subtle face pattern. Eye color ranges from brown along western Gulf Coast to yellow on Atlantic Coast. Strictly coastal, except in Florida where they occur inland (often around human development). Overlaps with similar Great-tailed Grackle on Texas coast, but occurs more strictly in coastal saltmarshes and has dark eye (not pale).
column4: 大而瘦长的黑鸟，有圆形的冠和长长的尾巴。雄鱼的尾巴长得出奇，几乎和身体一样长，通常呈v形，就像船的龙骨。雄性是光滑的黑色。雌性是棕色的，有微妙的面部图案。眼睛的颜色从墨西哥湾西部沿岸的棕色到大西洋沿岸的黄色不等。严格的沿海地区，除了佛罗里达，它们发生在内陆(通常在人类发展的周围)。与类似的大尾石头鸟在德克萨斯州海岸重叠，但更严格地发生在沿海盐沼，有黑色的眼睛(不是苍白)。

column3: 体型小巧，喙甚细。眼睛红色，头顶在眼后隆起。繁殖个体颊部有一簇扇形的黄色饰羽，背部黑色，身体大多为暗褐色。冬季时身体灰色，头顶黑色，脸颊污白色，颈部污灰色。常见于大型开阔水域。
column4: 体型小巧，喙甚细。眼睛红色，头顶在眼后隆起。繁殖个体颊部有一簇扇形的黄色饰羽，背部黑色，身体大多为暗褐色。冬季时身体灰色，头顶黑色，脸颊污白色，颈部污灰色。常见于大型开阔水域。

column3: 体型小巧，喙细。繁殖个体红色的眼睛后方有一簇黄色饰羽，脸颊黑色，身体锈色。冬季时整体灰色，头顶的黑色覆羽跟白色的脸颊形成鲜明的对比。红色的双眼一般在近距离观测时才能看清。繁殖于沼塘；常见于大型湖泊和开洋，越冬和迁徙时远离海岸及植被。
column4: 体型小巧，喙细。繁殖个体红色的眼睛后方有一簇黄色饰羽，脸颊黑色，身体锈色。冬季时整体灰色，头顶的黑色覆羽跟白色的脸颊形成鲜明的对比。红色的双眼一般在近距离观测时才能看清。繁殖于沼塘；常见于大型湖泊和开洋，越冬和迁徙时远离海岸及植被。

column3: Small brown grebe with a stout bill. Note dark eyes. During breeding season, look for black ring around white bill. In winter, neck is often washed with a cinnamon tone. Juvenile has stripes on head. Fairly common and widespread throughout the Americas, where it occurs on ponds and marshes, often with emergent vegetation. Frequently dives underwater to feed on fish.
column4: 长着粗壮喙的棕色小灰鹦鹉。注意黑色的眼睛。在繁殖季节，寻找白色喙周围的黑色环。在冬天，经常用肉桂色清洗颈部。幼鱼头部有条纹。在整个美洲相当普遍和广泛，在池塘和沼泽中出现，通常有新兴的植被。经常潜入水下捕食鱼类。

column3: Large, long-necked grebe with very long, thin, yellow bill. Black cap extends below red eye, sometimes with just a small white spot in front of the eye. Long, gray body rides low in the water. Breeds on marshy lakes, where it builds a floating nest of vegetation. Mostly found on saltwater bays and open ocean in winter, but also lakes. Very similar to Clark’s Grebe, with extensive range overlap and often in mixed flocks. Typically outnumbers Clark’s where they occur together. Western looks darker overall, especially on the sides and face. Also look at the bill: duller yellow on Western, often with a slight greenish tinge, and with a dark lower edge. Some birds appear intermediate and should be left unidentified.
column4: 大的，长颈的灰毛猫，长而细的黄色喙。黑帽延伸到红眼下面，有时在眼睛前面只有一个小白点。长长的、灰色的身体在水中低低地游动。在沼泽湖上繁殖，在那里用植物筑巢。冬季主要分布在咸水湾和开阔海域，也有湖泊。非常类似于克拉克的格雷布，有广泛的范围重叠，经常在混合群中。通常会比克拉克的多。西方人总体上看起来肤色更深，尤其是两侧和脸部。也看一下它的喙:西部的暗黄色，通常带有轻微的绿色，并且有深色的下边缘。有些鸟类似乎处于中间状态，不应该被确认。

column3: Beefy, big-headed, large-billed bunting. Male is deep cobalt blue with rufous wingbars. Females are warm brown with rufous or buffy wingbars. Always look for enormous bill to separate from other buntings; also note unstreaked underparts and slightly longer tail. Swishes tail like other buntings. Fairly common in overgrown fields with hedgerows and bushes. Breeds mostly in the southern half of the U.S. and northern Mexico; winters throughout Central America. Often gathers in flocks in the winter.
column4: 强壮、大头、大嘴的狩猎。雄性是深钴蓝色的，翅膀是红褐色的。雌性是温暖的棕色，有棕褐色或褐色的翅条。总是寻找巨大的喙，以区别于其他狩猎;也注意无条纹的下腹部和稍长的尾巴。像其他狩猎动物一样摇尾巴。在有树篱和灌木丛的杂草丛生的田野中相当常见。品种主要在美国南部和墨西哥北部;冬季遍布中美洲。经常在冬天成群聚集。

column3: 黄昏雀，生活在加拿大、美国和墨西哥的西部山区的针叶林和混交林。非产卵季节，它们往往成群觅食，主要吃种子，浆果和昆虫。过去认为它属于自己的属，如今通常将它与欧亚大陆的锡嘴雀归于同一属。黄昏雀长度16-21.5厘米；尾长6-7厘米；翼展30-36厘米；重量52-74克。 黄昏雀成鸟有一个黑色短尾巴，黑色瓷帮以及翼和一个大的浅色喙。成年雄性有一个亮黄色的额头和身体，它的头是棕色的，翅膀有大白斑点。成年雌性主要是橄榄褐色，腹部灰暗，翅膀有白色斑点。
column4: 黄昏雀，生活在加拿大、美国和墨西哥的西部山区的针叶林和混交林。非产卵季节，它们往往成群觅食，主要吃种子，浆果和昆虫。过去认为它属于自己的属，如今通常将它与欧亚大陆的锡嘴雀归于同一属。黄昏雀长度16-21.5厘米；尾长6-7厘米；翼展30-36厘米；重量52-74克。 黄昏雀成鸟有一个黑色短尾巴，黑色瓷帮以及翼和一个大的浅色喙。成年雄性有一个亮黄色的额头和身体，它的头是棕色的，翅膀有大白斑点。成年雌性主要是橄榄褐色，腹部灰暗，翅膀有白色斑点。

column3: Large, plump finch of the boreal forest. Adult males are pink overall with two white wingbars and pale gray highlights. Immature males and females are not so bright but still subtly pretty; gray body with olive, yellow, or burnt-orange head and rump. Stubby bill with rounded edges. Breeds in open coniferous forests. Winters in a variety of wooded habitats, especially around fruiting trees including crabapple and mountain ash. Often extremely tame, allowing close approach.
column4: 北方森林中体型大而丰满的雀。成年雄鸟全身呈粉红色，有两根白色翼条和浅灰色的亮点。不成熟的雄性和雌性没有那么聪明，但仍然有微妙的美丽;灰色的身体，橄榄色、黄色或焦橙色的头部和臀部。粗短的喙，边缘圆润。在开阔的针叶林中繁殖。冬天栖息在各种树木繁茂的栖息地，尤其是在果树周围，包括海棠树和山灰树。通常非常温顺，允许接近。

column3: Breeding adult males are striking black and white with bright red triangle on breast. Nonbreeding males, females, and immatures are streaky below with a bold head pattern. Always look for the very thick, pale pinkish bill. Fairly common and widespread in eastern North America, especially in deciduous forests. Winters to northern South America. Visits feeders. Listen for sweet robinlike song and squeaky call. Females are sometimes confused with Purple Finch but note much larger overall size, large pinkish bill, and bolder white markings on wings. Also compare females and immature males with extremely similar Black-headed Grosbeak, which is usually identifiable by range. Rose-breasted usually has more extensive, coarser streaking on underparts and usually lacks orange tones.
column4: 正处于繁殖期的成年雄性，身体呈醒目的黑白相间，胸部呈鲜红色三角形。非繁殖的雄性、雌性和未成熟的雄性在下面有条纹，头部有大胆的图案。一定要寻找非常厚的淡粉色的喙。在北美东部相当普遍和广泛，特别是在落叶林中。冬季到南美洲北部。访问喂食器。聆听甜美的知更鸟般的歌声和吱吱的叫声。雌性有时与紫翅雀混淆，但注意到整体体型更大，大的粉红色喙，翅膀上更醒目的白色斑纹。也比较雌性和未成熟的雄性与非常相似的黑头格罗斯比克，这通常可以通过范围来识别。玫瑰色胸脯通常有更广泛，更粗糙的条纹在腹部，通常缺乏橙色色调。

column3: Small jet-black seabird of coastal areas of the Pacific. Breeding plumage is black with bold white wing patch and bright red legs. Plumage changes dramatically in winter to whitish overall with dusky markings on body and black wingtips. Often found in shallower coastal waters than other alcids and regularly seen from shore. Dives to hunt for fish and invertebrates. Nests in crevice or burrow in a cliff or around large rocks.
column4: 太平洋沿岸的黑色小海鸟。繁殖羽毛是黑色的，有醒目的白色翅斑和鲜红色的腿。羽毛在冬季急剧变化，整体呈白色，身体上有暗色的斑纹，翅尖呈黑色。通常发现于较浅的海岸水域比其他酸和经常从岸上看到。潜入水中捕食鱼类和无脊椎动物。在悬崖或大岩石周围的裂缝或洞穴中筑巢。

column3: Medium-sized gull, a bit larger than Ring-billed Gull and smaller than Herring Gull. Adults have medium-gray upperparts (slightly darker than Herring Gull), and red and black markings on the bill. Takes four years for immatures to progress from mostly brown to fully white and gray adult plumage; intermediate plumages are often mottled and messy. Many immatures show a pink bill with a contrasting black tip, and dull pinkish or greenish-gray legs. Always note dark eye. Common and fairly widespread in western North America, inland and along the coast. Can be found at parking lots, beaches, or lakes, often in flocks with Herring and Ring-billed Gulls.
column4: 中等大小的海鸥，比环嘴鸥大一点，比银鸥小一点。成年海鸥的上半身为中灰色(比银鸥略深)，喙上有红色和黑色的斑纹。未成熟的鸟需要四年的时间才能从大部分棕色的羽毛变成完全白色和灰色的成年羽毛;中间羽毛通常是斑驳和凌乱的。许多未成熟的鸟有粉红色的喙和对比鲜明的黑色尖端，和暗粉红色或绿灰色的腿。一定要注意黑眼睛。在北美西部、内陆和沿海地区普遍分布。可以在停车场、海滩或湖泊找到它们，经常成群地与鲱鱼和环嘴鸥在一起。

column3: Large, stocky gull of the North Pacific. Generally fairly pale and uniform-looking; at all ages, note wingtips and back are approximately the same color. Takes four years for immatures to progress from mostly brown to fully white and gray adult plumage; intermediate plumages are often mottled and messy. Most immatures look frosty grayish-brown with smooth patterning. Found in coastal areas, including beaches, mudflats, and even city parks. Identification is complicated by frequent hybridization with Western, Herring, and Glaucous Gulls in various parts of range. Pure birds can be difficult to find and identify with certainty, and many intermediate birds are best left unidentified.
column4: 北太平洋体型大、结实的海鸥。苍白的:通常相当苍白和均匀的;在所有年龄段，注意翼梢和背部的颜色大致相同。未成熟的鸟需要四年的时间才能从大部分棕色的羽毛变成完全白色和灰色的成年羽毛;中间羽毛通常是斑驳和凌乱的。大多数未成熟的看起来霜灰色的棕色光滑的图案。在沿海地区，包括海滩，泥滩，甚至城市公园都有发现。由于在不同地区与西方鸥、鲱鱼鸥和白眉鸥频繁杂交，鉴定变得复杂。纯鸟可能很难找到和确定地识别，许多中间的鸟最好不被识别。

column3: Unique smoky-gray gull with red bill. Breeding adults have a clean white head that blends seamlessly into the gray neck; nonbreeding adults have smudgy dark streaking on the head. Immatures are entirely dark brown with a yellowish or reddish bill with a dark tip. Almost exclusively coastal; usually seen in flocks loafing on beaches or feeding in nearshore waters. Breeds in Mexico mainly in the Gulf of California; migrates as far north as Washington and British Columbia in winter. Overall dark plumage of immatures might recall a dark-morph jaeger; note Heermann's lacks pale wing flashes and never shows pale mottling on the belly or underwings.
column4: 独特的烟灰色海鸥，红色的嘴。繁殖的成年犬有一个干净的白色头部，与灰色的颈部无缝融合;不能繁殖的成虫头部有肮脏的深色条纹。未成熟的完全是深棕色的，带有黄色或红色的喙，尖端是黑色的。几乎全在沿海;通常成群地在海滩上游荡或在近岸水域觅食。品种主要在墨西哥的加利福尼亚湾;冬天迁徙到北至华盛顿和不列颠哥伦比亚。未成熟鸟的整体深色羽毛可能会让人想起深色变形机甲;注意Heermann没有苍白的翅膀闪光，也没有在腹部或翅膀下显示苍白的斑驳。

column3: 广布于内陆和沿海地区的常见鸥类。成鸟背部灰色，翼尖黑色。亚成鸟羽色从褐色换为白色和灰色，换羽时间为四年。换羽过程中的羽色通常斑驳杂乱。觅食于海边、滩涂、耕地和开洋。常与其他鸥类混成大群，特别是在渔船，海滩，码头和垃圾场附近。
column4: 广布于内陆和沿海地区的常见鸥类。成鸟背部灰色，翼尖黑色。亚成鸟羽色从褐色换为白色和灰色，换羽时间为四年。换羽过程中的羽色通常斑驳杂乱。觅食于海边、滩涂、耕地和开洋。常与其他鸥类混成大群，特别是在渔船，海滩，码头和垃圾场附近。

column3: A spectacular and highly sought-after Arctic gull. Unmistakable in all plumages. Adults are entirely gleaming white with black legs and a bluish-green bill with an orange tip. Immatures have a dark face and variable black spotting on the wings and tail. Stocky and short-legged, suggesting an odd white pigeon as much as a typical gull. Almost always restricted to icy areas in the High Arctic, very rarely wandering further south in the winter. Can be seen singly or in loose groups, especially when feeding at a seal carcass. Typically very confiding.
column4: 一种壮观而备受追捧的北极海鸥。在所有的羽毛中都不会出错。成虫全身白色，腿黑色，喙呈蓝绿色，尖呈橙色。未成熟的有深色的脸，翅膀和尾巴上有可变的黑色斑点。结实、短腿，既像典型的海鸥，也像奇怪的白鸽。几乎总是被限制在北极高纬度的冰区，很少在冬天向南游荡。可以单独或散居在一起，尤其是在进食海豹尸体时。典型的非常自信。

column3: Fairly small gull, common and widespread throughout most of North America. Breeding adults are white-headed with a bold black ring around the bill; nonbreeding adults have smudgy brown markings on the head. Note pale eye and yellow legs. Immatures are mottled brownish overall; note pink bill with black tip. Found along lakes, rivers, ponds, and beaches. More common inland than most other gull species, and quite fond of parking lots and urban areas. Often in flocks. Most similar to Short-billed Gull, but larger and larger-billed. Immatures of the two species are especially difficult to differentiate, but Ring-billed is usually more coarsely mottled.
column4: 相当小的海鸥，在北美大部分地区普遍分布。正在繁殖的成年鸟头是白色的，喙周围有一个醒目的黑色环;不能繁殖的成虫头部有肮脏的棕色斑纹。注意苍白的眼睛和黄色的腿。未成熟的整体呈褐色斑驳;注意粉红色的喙和黑色的尖。分布在湖泊、河流、池塘和海滩边。比大多数其他种类的海鸥在内陆更常见，并且非常喜欢停车场和城市地区。通常成群的。最类似于短嘴鸥，但更大更大的嘴。两种未成熟的鸟特别难以区分，但环嘴鸟通常有较粗的斑驳。

column3: 北方沿海的大型鸥类；其厚实、短翅的体态将其与许多类似的亚洲鸥类区分。成鸟背部和翅膀深灰色，腿亮粉色；站立时，翼尖附近显一大块新月状白斑（白色三级飞羽羽缘）。繁殖成鸟头部白色；非繁殖成鸟头部和胸部有褐色条纹。亚成鸟整体深褐色；换羽时腹部羽色逐渐变浅，背部变灰（第四年达到成鸟羽色）。叫声为低沉、生动的”khaao“。
column4: 北方沿海的大型鸥类；其厚实、短翅的体态将其与许多类似的亚洲鸥类区分。成鸟背部和翅膀深灰色，腿亮粉色；站立时，翼尖附近显一大块新月状白斑（白色三级飞羽羽缘）。繁殖成鸟头部白色；非繁殖成鸟头部和胸部有褐色条纹。亚成鸟整体深褐色；换羽时腹部羽色逐渐变浅，背部变灰（第四年达到成鸟羽色）。叫声为低沉，生动的“khaao”。

column3: Large, stocky gull with a stout bill. Adults have rather dark gray upperparts and bright pink legs. Takes four years for immatures to progress from mostly brown to fully white and gray adult plumage; intermediate plumages are often mottled and messy. Starts to develop dark gray back in second year. At all ages, look for overall stocky shape and large bill. Strictly coastal, occurring along beaches and bays along the Pacific coast. Commonly seen around coastal towns and cities, but almost never ventures inland. Identification is muddied by frequent hybridization, especially with Glaucous-winged Gull at the northern end of its range. Hybrids can show any mix of intermediate traits; some are best left unidentified.
column4: 大而结实的海鸥，有结实的喙。成虫的上肢呈深灰色，腿呈亮粉色。未成熟的鸟需要四年的时间才能从大部分棕色的羽毛变成完全白色和灰色的成年羽毛;中间羽毛通常是斑驳和凌乱的。第二年开始变深灰色。在所有年龄段，寻找整体粗壮的形状和大喙。主要发生在沿岸，沿太平洋沿岸的海滩和海湾。常见于沿海城镇，但几乎从不冒险进入内陆。频繁的杂交使识别变得混乱，特别是在其活动范围的北端与白羽鸥。杂交种可以表现出任何中间性状的混合;有些是最好的未知。

column3: Relatively large-headed and chunky. Gray and green overall, lacking buffy or orangey tones. Males have shocking magenta head, which appears dark when not catching the light. Females have dingy grayish underparts and often show a dark patch in the center of the throat. Note relatively short, straight bill compared with Black-chinned or Costa’s Hummingbird. Common year-round in the Pacific states of the U.S., mainly in relatively open or scrubby habitats including desert scrub and chaparral. Frequently seen in suburban yards and gardens, often visiting sugar water feeders. Expanding its range northward into British Columbia, even regular in southeast Alaska. Winters to southern Baja and locally elsewhere in Mexico. Listen for male’s scratchy, metallic song, given when perched.
column4: 相对较大的头部和粗壮。灰色和绿色的整体，缺乏褐色或橙色调。雄性有令人震惊的洋红色头部，在没有光线的情况下看起来是黑色的。雌性的腹部呈暗灰色，在喉咙中心经常有一块深色的斑块。注意相对短，直的嘴与黑下巴或科斯塔的蜂鸟。常见于美国太平洋各州，主要生长在相对开阔或灌木丛生的栖息地，包括沙漠灌木和灌木林。经常出现在郊区的院子和花园，经常访问糖水喂食器。向北扩展到不列颠哥伦比亚省，甚至经常在阿拉斯加东南部活动。冬季到巴哈南部和墨西哥其他地方。聆听雄鸟在栖息时发出的沙哑、金属般的歌声。

column3: Small hummingbird found in a variety of woodland and brushy habitats. Male distinctive with ruby-red throat and black chin. Female has whitish underparts with almost no buffy tones (perhaps a very light wash on flanks). Readily comes to sugar water feeders and flower gardens. Default summer hummingbird over most of eastern U.S. and Canada. Winters south to Panama. Very difficult to distinguish from Black-chinned Hummingbird, especially females and young males; thankfully limited range overlap. Ruby-throated averages somewhat brighter green above, shorter- and straighter-billed, and has slightly narrower outer wing feathers, but these differences are all extremely subtle.
column4: 小型蜂鸟，见于各种林地和灌木栖息地。雄性的特点是红宝石红色的喉咙和黑色的下巴。雌性的下腹呈白色，几乎没有褐色的色调(可能在两侧有很浅的水洗色)。很容易来到糖水喂食器和花园。默认的夏季蜂鸟在美国东部和加拿大的大部分地区。冬季南至巴拿马。很难与黑下巴蜂鸟区分，尤其是雌性和年轻的雄性;幸运的是，重叠的范围有限。红宝石喉鸟的平均上方绿色略亮，喙短而直，外翼羽毛略窄，但这些差异都非常细微。

column3: Adult males are almost entirely orange with bright white chest and some green on the back (can be solid green like Allen's Hummingbird). Throat is iridescent, and depending on the light, can look anywhere from red to orange to yellow to lime green. On females and immatures, look for orange on sides and tail to separate from Anna's and Black-chinned. Found in a variety of wooded habitats; more common in migration in suburbs, meadows, and other brushier areas. Feeds on nectar and tiny insects.
column4: 成年雄性几乎全是橙色的，胸部是亮白色的，背部是绿色的(可以是纯绿色的，比如艾伦的蜂鸟)。喉咙是彩虹色的，根据光线的不同，可以从红色到橙色到黄色到酸橙绿色。雌性和未成熟的，寻找橙色的侧面和尾部，以区分安娜和黑下巴。见于各种树木繁茂的栖息地的;常见于郊区、草地和其他多毛地区的移民。以花蜜和小昆虫为食。

column3: Rather large, overall bright green hummingbird of highlands. Favors pine-oak forest and edge, especially overgrown clearings and roadsides with dense flower banks. Fairly common and is especially conspicuous when singing. Song is a jerky, metallic, chipping song given tirelessly from an exposed twig at middle to upper levels in trees. When feeding often stays fairly well hidden within flowers. Note overall deep green plumage with dark violet cheek and breast patches, and broad dark tail band.
column4: 相当大的，整体亮绿色的高原蜂鸟。喜欢松栎林和边缘，特别是杂草丛生的空地和路边密集的花丛。相当常见，唱歌时尤其明显。歌曲是一种粗犷的，金属的，断断续续的歌曲，从树的中高层暴露的树枝上不知疲倦地发出。当进食时，它们通常会很好地隐藏在花中。注意整个深绿色的羽毛，深紫色的脸颊和胸部斑块，和宽的深色尾带。

column3: 冠蓝鸦，又名蓝松鸦，是雀形目鸦科冠蓝鸦属鸟类，其雄性和雌性在外形上相似，雄鸟体长略大一点；面部呈白色，有蓝色的脊背、翅膀和尾巴，其中点缀着黑色和白色，喉咙处也有一圈黑色羽毛，围绕在头部周围；爪子、腿和眼睛都是黑色的。其以深蓝色的羽毛和翅膀上黑白分明的条纹而得名。冠蓝鸦主要生活在北美洲，广泛分布于加拿大南部及美国中部、南部，适应性强、侵略性强、杂食性强，可以四处建窝安家。食物为坚果、植物的种子、昆虫等。冠蓝鸦在兴奋、进攻和求偶时，顶冠会高高竖起；当其受到惊吓时，顶冠会如毛刷一般四面张开。雌鸟每次产下3-6个蛋，蛋的颜色为蓝绿色，且具有棕色或灰色斑点。
column4: 冠蓝鸦，又名蓝松鸦，是雀形目鸦科冠蓝鸦属鸟类，其雄性和雌性在外形上相似，雄鸟体长略大一点；面部呈白色，有蓝色的脊背、翅膀和尾巴，其中点缀着黑色和白色，喉咙处也有一圈黑色羽毛，围绕在头部周围；爪子、腿和眼睛都是黑色的。其以深蓝色的羽毛和翅膀上黑白分明的条纹而得名。冠蓝鸦主要生活在北美洲，广泛分布于加拿大南部及美国中部、南部，适应性强、侵略性强、杂食性强，可以四处建窝安家。食物为坚果、植物的种子、昆虫等。冠蓝鸦在兴奋、进攻和求偶时，顶冠会高高竖起；当其受到惊吓时，顶冠会如毛刷一般四面张开。雌鸟每次产下3-6个蛋，蛋的颜色为蓝绿色，且具有棕色或灰色斑点。

column3: Bold, blue-and-gray jay of oak scrub in central Florida. Juveniles have browner head and back than adults. Lacks crest and patterning on the wings and tail seen on Blue Jay. Very social, staying in close family groups to raise young. Readily hops on the ground while searching for food. Unique scrubby habitat must burn periodically in order to remain appropriate for Florida Scrub-Jays. Classified as threatened under the Endangered Species Act.
column4: 大胆的蓝灰色松鸦，栖息于佛罗里达州中部的橡树灌木丛中。幼鱼的头部和背部比成年鱼的颜色更浅。没有冠，也没有蓝冠鸦翅膀和尾巴上的图案。非常社会化，待在亲密的家庭群体中抚养孩子。在寻找食物时，随时在地上跳跃。独特的灌丛栖息地必须定期燃烧，以保持适合佛罗里达灌丛鸟。根据《濒危物种法》被列为受威胁物种。

column3: Stunning and unmistakable: green and yellow plumage with bold black-and-blue head pattern. Birds from Texas to Honduras have a blue crown, dark eye, and relatively uniform lime-green body, and occur in small flocks in woodland with brushy understory. Birds in South America, sometimes called Inca Jays, occur in Andean cloud forest from Venezuela to Bolivia. They show a white crown, pale eye, blue forehead tuft, and rich sulphur-yellow belly contrasting with darker green upperparts. Both populations give a variety of strange mechanical calls.
column4: 令人惊叹和无误:绿色和黄色的羽毛与大胆的黑蓝色头部图案。从德克萨斯到洪都拉斯的鸟类有蓝色的冠，深色的眼睛和相对均匀的石灰绿色身体，在有灌木丛的林地中出现小群。南美洲的鸟类，有时被称为印加鸦，出现在从委内瑞拉到玻利维亚的安第斯云雾森林中。它们有白色的冠，浅色的眼睛，蓝色的前额，和丰富的硫磺黄色的腹部，与深绿色的上部形成对比。两个种群都会发出各种奇怪的机械叫声。

column3: Unique sparrow with incredible variation between populations. Generally patterned with gray, white, and shades of tan. All have pinkish bills and white outer tail feathers. Juveniles are streaky. Breeds in a variety of forested habitats, especially with conifers. Found in any wooded habitat in the winter, often in flocks. Usually forages on the ground for seeds, but also fond of brushy thickets or weedy fields. Visits feeders. Subspecies include: Slate-colored (widespread), Oregon (West), Pink-sided (Rockies), Gray-headed (Rockies and southwest U.S. to Mexico), Red-backed (central Arizona and New Mexico), and White-winged (breeds in Black Hills, winters mainly Colorado).
column4: 独特的麻雀，种群之间有着惊人的差异。通常以灰色、白色和深浅的棕褐色为图案。它们都有粉红色的喙和白色的外尾羽。幼鱼有条纹。在各种森林栖息地繁殖，尤其是针叶树。冬天栖息于任何树木繁茂的栖息地，常成群出没。通常在地上觅食种子，但也喜欢灌木丛或杂草丛生的田地。访问喂食器。亚种包括:石板色(广泛分布)，俄勒冈州(西部)，粉红面(落基山脉)，灰头(落基山脉和美国西南部到墨西哥)，红背(亚利桑那州中部和新墨西哥州)和白翅(在黑山繁殖，冬季主要在科罗拉多州)。

column3: Large, ubiquitous yellow-bellied flycatcher found throughout most of Middle and South America, though tends to be uncommon at the far northern end of its range in the U.S. A classic “telephone wire” bird along roadsides and in towns. Prefers open areas with some trees and water. Most abundant in lowlands and foothills, but ventures up to over 3,000m in some parts of range. Listen for sharp, high-pitched twitters. Nearly identical to Couch’s Kingbird, which overlaps from Texas to Belize; best separated by voice. Larger and longer-billed than Western and Cassin’s Kingbird; also note paler brownish tail. Also very similar to White-throated (longer, forked tail) and Snowy-throated (dark mask) Kingbirds in some parts of South America.
column4: 大的、无处不在的黄腹捕蝇鸟，分布在中美洲和南美洲的大部分地区，但在其活动范围的最北端并不常见。在路边和城镇里，这是一种典型的“电话线”鸟。喜欢有树和水的开阔区域。最丰富的低地和山麓，但在一些地区冒险超过3000米。倾听尖锐、高音调的啾啾声。与库奇的Kingbird几乎相同，从德克萨斯州到伯利兹重叠;最好隔着声音。比西部和卡辛的王鸟更大，喙更长;也注意到浅棕色的尾巴。也非常类似于南美部分地区的白喉(长，分叉的尾巴)和雪喉(深色面具)王鸟。

column3: A relatively pale kingbird, medium-gray above and white below with a darker face mask. Primarily a Caribbean species with limited range in U.S.; found around the edge of dense woodland, especially near the coast. Also seen in more suburban areas. Often perches conspicuously on a snag, treetop, or powerline. Feeds on insects. Listen for its high-pitched twittering calls. Compare with Eastern and Loggerhead Kingbirds; Gray Kingbird has lighter gray upperparts, a thicker bill, and lacks white tail tips.
column4: 一种相对苍白的王鸟，上灰色，下白色，面罩较深。主要是一个在美国范围有限的加勒比种;在茂密的林地边缘发现的，尤指在海岸附近。在郊区也有。经常栖息在显眼的树枝、树梢或电线上。以昆虫为食。倾听它的高音鸣叫。与东方王鸟和红雀比较;灰色Kingbird有浅灰色的上部，较厚的喙，没有白色的尾端。

column3: Stocky and large-headed with a shaggy crest. Bill is long, straight, thick, and pointed. Powder blue above with white underparts and blue breast band. Females have additional rusty band across belly. Almost always solitary, perched along edges of streams, lakes, and estuaries. Flies along rivers and shorelines giving loud rattling calls. Hunts for fish by plunging headfirst into the water, either directly from a perch or hovering.
column4: 粗壮的，头大的，有蓬松的冠毛。比尔长、直、厚、尖。上面是粉蓝色，下身是白色，胸带是蓝色。雌性在腹部有额外的锈带。它们几乎总是孤独地栖息在溪流、湖泊和河口的边缘。苍蝇沿着河流和海岸线发出响亮的叫声。直接从栖木上或悬停在水中，头朝下跳入水中捕食鱼。

column3: Small kingfisher with disproportionately long bill. Dark glossy green above with white throat, collar, and spots on wings. Tail often held cocked up. White outer tail feathers spotted with green conspicuous in flight. Male has rufous breast; female breast white with spotted green double-collar. Found along rivers or ponds. Less conspicuous than some other kingfishers, often perching on overhanging branches close to water's surface. Low flight with quick wingbeats.
column4: 喙长得不成比例的小翠鸟。上面有深绿色光泽，颈部、颈圈和翅膀上有白色斑点。尾巴经常翘起。白色的尾羽外层有斑点，在飞行中有明显的绿色。男性有棕褐色乳房;雌性胸部白色带斑点绿色双领。沿河或池塘发现的不像其他翠鸟那么显眼，经常栖息在靠近水面的悬垂树枝上。低空快速拍打翅膀。

column3: 羽色对比鲜明的黑白色翠鸟，具短而浓密的冠羽和光滑的纯黑色喙。乍看类似于冠鱼狗，但斑鱼狗体型较小，且有更明显的斑纹和不竖起的羽冠。群居性，常成对或集小群觅食和停栖。觅食时常在水域上方盘旋。栖于各种水边的生境，包括湖泊、河口及红树林。
column4: 羽色对比鲜明的黑白色翠鸟，具短而浓密的冠羽和光滑的纯黑色喙。乍看类似于冠鱼狗，但斑鱼狗体型较小，且有更明显的斑纹和不竖起的羽冠。群居性，常成对或集小群觅食和停栖。觅食时常在水域上方盘旋。栖于各种水边的生境，包括湖泊、河口及红树林。

column3: Largest kingfisher in Americas with exceptionally enormous bill and raucous calls. Blue-gray with shaggy crest, white collar, and rufous belly. Male and female similar, but note different breast pattern: entirely rufous on male, while female has blue-gray band bordered by white. Often conspicuous, searching shallow water for fish from a prominent perch and chattering noisily when disturbed. Singles or pairs are also often observed flying high overhead and giving loud "keck" calls. Nests in burrows excavated in banks, generally along watercourses.
column4: 美洲最大的翠鸟，喙特别大，叫声沙哑。蓝灰色，羽冠蓬松，项圈白色，腹部呈赤褐色。雄性和雌性相似，但注意到不同的胸部图案:雄性完全是棕褐色，而雌性有蓝灰色带，边缘是白色。通常很显眼，在浅水中寻找显眼的栖木上的鱼，受到干扰时会大声地叽叽喳喳。人们还经常观察到单只或成对的鸟从头顶飞过，发出响亮的“凯克”叫声。在河岸上挖的洞里筑巢，通常沿着水道。

column3: 大^，主w是褐色的翠B，有{色背部和翅膀，厚重的橙色嘴，以及暮迪蛳卵由斓礁共康难┌咨大斑K。在水附近和h都常；常看到停在竦兀湖泊，r田和空地附近的诤碗上。通常在w行中l出尖J亮的猛禽般的u弱音和咯咯。
column4: 大^，主w是褐色的翠B，有{色背部和翅膀，厚重的橙色嘴，以及暮迪蛳卵由斓礁共康难┌咨大斑K。在水附近和h都常；常看到停在竦兀湖泊，r田和空地附近的诤碗上。通常在w行中l出尖J亮的猛禽般的u弱音和咯咯。

column3: Crisp small gull with very limited range; breeds on rocky cliffs on islands in the Bering Sea, from Alaska to Russia; winters on open ocean. Size and plumage most similar to Black-legged Kittiwake, but back is darker gray, yellow bill is shorter, legs are shorter and bright red, and underwing is darker gray. Nonbreeding birds have a dark smudge around eye and a thin gray ear patch. Young birds are similar to nonbreeding adults but with black bill, duller legs, and more contrasting wing pattern.
column4: 清脆的小海鸥，活动范围非常有限;在从阿拉斯加到俄罗斯的白令海岛上的岩石悬崖上繁殖;冬天在公海上。大小和羽毛与黑腿三趾鸥最相似，但背部为深灰色，黄色的喙较短，腿较短，呈亮红色，翼下为深灰色。非繁殖鸟类的眼睛周围有黑色的斑点，耳朵上有薄薄的灰色斑块。幼鸟与未繁殖的成年鸟相似，但有黑色的喙，钝腿和更鲜明的翅膀图案。

column3: Squat-looking bird with short legs and low-profile body. Adults are mostly sandy-brown with white belly, sometimes with blurry streaks on sides of breast. Look for bold head pattern, especially black mask and chest band. Throat color varies from yellow to white. Namesake horns on head are sometimes visible at close range. Juveniles can be confusing; they are messy-looking, grayish-brown with bold white spots and scallops on the upperparts. Note bill shape to help separate from sparrows or longspurs. Widespread in open habitats throughout the Northern Hemisphere. Typically seen in flocks, sometimes mixed in with other open-ground songbirds, running along the ground in open areas with little to no vegetation. Listen for lovely jumbled song, as well as variable high-pitched calls when flying over.
column4: 蹲着的鸟，腿短，身体不显眼。成虫大多为沙褐色，腹部呈白色，有时胸部两侧有模糊的条纹。寻找大胆的头部图案，尤其是黑色面具和胸带。喉咙的颜色从黄色到白色不等。头部的同名角有时在近距离可见。青少年可能令人困惑;它们看起来很乱，灰褐色，上面有醒目的白色斑点和扇贝。注意喙的形状，以帮助区分麻雀或长刺。广泛分布于北半球的开阔栖息地。通常成群结队，有时与其他露天鸣禽混在一起，在很少或没有植被的露天地区沿着地面奔跑。聆听可爱的杂乱的歌曲，以及飞行时可变的高音呼叫。

column3: A medium-sized loon, common in western North America and across the Pacific to Japan. Dark overall and relatively short-billed for a loon, with a rounded crown and nape. Breeding plumage striking with gray head, white-checkered back, and thin white lines on sides of neck. Nonbreeding plumage is rather dark gray above with a clearly demarcated white throat and even border between gray and white on the neck. Diagnostic dark “chinstrap” is sometimes obvious but can be difficult to see at a distance, and is often absent on first-year birds. Especially similar to Arctic Loon, which overlaps mainly from Alaska to Japan. Pacific is subtly smaller-billed and usually holds its head horizontally. In breeding plumage, Pacific has a paler nape that shines silvery in the sunlight, and thinner white lines on the neck than Arctic. Breeds on lakes and ponds in the tundra. Winters mainly on nearshore ocean waters, sometimes in sheltered bays. Often in loose groups, especially where food is plentiful; sometimes mixes with other loon species. Rare but regular on inland reservoirs and lakes during migration and winter.
column4: 一种中等大小的潜鸟，常见于北美西部和横跨太平洋至日本。对于潜鸟来说，全身颜色深，喙相对短，有圆形的冠和颈。繁殖羽毛，头部呈灰色，背部呈白色方格，颈部两侧有细白色线条。非繁殖期的羽毛是相当深灰色的，上面有明确划分的白色喉咙，脖子上甚至有灰色和白色之间的边界。诊断性的深色“帽带”有时很明显，但在远处很难看到，第一年的鸟通常没有。特别类似于北极潜龙，主要从阿拉斯加到日本重叠。太平洋的嘴稍微小一些，通常把头保持水平。在繁殖羽毛方面，太平洋的颈背在阳光下会发出银色的光，脖子上的白色线条比北极的更细。在冻土带的湖泊和池塘中繁殖。冬季主要在近岸海域，有时在隐蔽的海湾。常在松散的群体中，尤指食物充足的地方;有时与其他潜鸟种类混合。在迁徙和冬季期间在内陆水库和湖泊中罕见但经常出现。

column3: 绿头鸭是雁形目鸭科鸭属鸟类，又名野鸭。体长约58厘米。雄鸟头绿色，有一白色领环，胸栗色，翼镜蓝绿色，尾上、下覆羽黑色，嘴黄绿色，脚橙红色；雌鸟嘴橙黄色，贯眼纹黑褐色，全体褐色，有暗褐色斑纹。绿头鸭在世界各地均有分布。栖息于水生植物丰富的湖泊、河流、池塘、沼泽等水域中。喜结群活动，夏季结小群，秋季结大群南迁越冬，春末北迁。飞翔能力强；善于在水中游泳和戏水，擅长在水中觅食。食性广而杂，常以植物的种子、茎、叶和藻类、谷物以及小鱼小虾、甲壳类动物、昆虫等为食。公鸭约在150日龄性成熟，母鸭150-160日龄开始产卵。产卵期为3-5月，一般每窝产卵10枚左右，卵呈灰绿色或纯白色略带肉色，孵化期27-28天。人工饲养条件下有2-5月和8-12月两个产卵期。
column4: 绿头鸭是雁形目鸭科鸭属鸟类，又名野鸭。体长约58厘米。雄鸟头绿色，有一白色领环，胸栗色，翼镜蓝绿色，尾上、下覆羽黑色，嘴黄绿色，脚橙红色；雌鸟嘴橙黄色，贯眼纹黑褐色，全体褐色，有暗褐色斑纹。绿头鸭在世界各地均有分布。栖息于水生植物丰富的湖泊、河流、池塘、沼泽等水域中。喜结群活动，夏季结小群，秋季结大群南迁越冬，春末北迁。飞翔能力强；善于在水中游泳和戏水，擅长在水中觅食。食性广而杂，常以植物的种子、茎、叶和藻类、谷物以及小鱼小虾、甲壳类动物、昆虫等为食。公鸭约在150日龄性成熟，母鸭150-160日龄开始产卵。产卵期为3-5月，一般每窝产卵10枚左右，卵呈灰绿色或纯白色略带肉色，孵化期27-28天。人工饲养条件下有2-5月和8-12月两个产卵期。

column3: Streaked brown above and yellow below with distinctive black "V" on breast. In flight, short wings and spiky tail with white outer feathers are apparent. Breeds in fields and grasslands throughout much of western North America, regularly as far east as Michigan. Winters in a wider range of open habitats, even agricultural fields and roadsides. Extremely similar to Eastern Meadowlark and best distinguished by voice: listen for musical gurgling song and "chuk" calls. In winter, plumage looks paler and more washed-out than Eastern Meadowlark, with a less contrasting head pattern. Western is also more likely to be in flocks and areas with shorter grass (less pristine, extensive grasslands).
column4: 上面有棕色条纹，下面有黄色条纹，胸部有独特的黑色“V”字。在飞行中，明显的有短的翅膀和尖的尾巴，外面有白色的羽毛。在北美西部大部分地区的田野和草原上繁殖，经常东至密歇根州。冬天在更大范围的开放栖息地，甚至是农田和路边。与东部草地鹨非常相似，最能区分的是声音:听音乐的咯咯声和“chuk”的叫声。在冬天，羽毛看起来比东部草地鹨更苍白，更褪色，头部图案的对比也更少。西部也更有可能是在羊群和草地较短的地区(较少的原始，广阔的草原)。

column3: Small diving duck with thin serrated bill. Breeding males have showy black-and-white crest, a couple zebra stripes on the white breast, and cinnamon-colored sides. Females are brown with a puffy crest and partly yellow bill. Looks slender and long-necked in flight, with very fast wingbeats. Widespread across much of North America, but usually only seen in pairs or small flocks. Nests in cavities near small ponds or marshes; especially fond of wooded swamps. In winter, usually found on calm bodies of water; almost never on the ocean. Sometimes mixes loosely with other duck species.
column4: 嘴有细锯齿的小潜水鸭。繁殖期的雄性有艳丽的黑白羽冠，白色的乳房上有几条斑马条纹，两侧呈肉桂色。雌性是棕色的，有蓬松的冠和部分黄色的喙。飞行时看起来细长，脖子长，翅膀拍动非常快。广泛分布于北美大部分地区，但通常只成对或小群出现。在小池塘或沼泽附近的洞穴中筑巢;特别喜欢树木繁茂的沼泽。在冬季，通常在平静的水体中发现;几乎没有在海上。有时与其他种类的鸭混在一起。

column3: 身体较长的鸭类；羽冠蓬松，喙细且深红色。繁殖期雄鸟头部深绿色，胸部褐色，两侧灰色。雌鸟和亚成雄鸟头部褐色，身体灰色。相比普通秋沙鸭喙部更细，羽冠更蓬松，整体体态更为纤细。常在大型水域下潜捕鱼，包括淡水湖泊和沿海地区。相比普通秋沙鸭更加偏爱咸水。
column4: 身体较长的鸭类；羽冠蓬松，喙细且深红色。繁殖期雄鸟头部深绿色，胸部褐色，两侧灰色。雌鸟和亚成雄鸟头部褐色，身体灰色。相比普通秋沙鸭喙部更细，羽冠更蓬松，整体体态更为纤细。常在大型水域下潜捕鱼，包括淡水湖泊和沿海地区。相比普通秋沙鸭更加偏爱咸水。

column3: Gray with whitish underparts and long tail. In flight, it becomes much flashier with large white patches on the black wings and tail. Pale eye. Found in a variety of habitats with bushes and trees, from neighborhoods to desert scrub and old pastures. Mimics birds, car alarms, slamming doors, and other noises in its song, repeating a phrase 5-7 times before switching to next set of notes.
column4: 灰色，下腹呈白色，尾长。在飞行中，黑色的翅膀和尾巴上有大片的白色斑块，它变得更加闪亮。苍白的眼睛。在各种有灌木和树木的栖息地，从社区到沙漠灌木丛和旧牧场。在它的歌声中模仿鸟儿、汽车警报、摔门和其他声音，在切换到下一组音符之前，重复一个短语5-7次。

column3: 夜鹰是夜鹰目夜鹰科鸟类的通称。头较扁平，喙极短小，但嘴裂宽阔，有发达的嘴须或特化成须状的羽毛；两翼尖长或短圆；尾较长，平尾或圆尾，有的种类尾羽特型延长；脚短，并趾型。雌雄同色，体色多以褐色、白色、黑色和棕色为主，斑驳似猫头鹰。夜鹰遍布热带和温带地区（新西兰、南美最南部和大部分海岛除外）。多数种类栖息于靠近草原和沙漠的森林边缘带，少数种类栖息于森林，在黎明、黄昏和夜晚活动。以昆虫为食。其繁殖期与昆虫的季节性繁盛期保持一致，在温带地区为暮春和夏季，在热带通常为潮湿季节末期。 [6]窝卵数1-2枚；白色或浅黄色，常带斑。孵化期16-22天，雏鸟留巢期16-30天。夜鹰以它们奇特的鸣声出名。由于白天栖息时一动不动，再加上伪装性很强的体羽，它们很难被发现。对于这种行踪隐秘的鸟，流传着许多迷信的说法，如苏拉威西岛北部的环颈毛腿夜鹰，当地人相信这种鸟会啄出人的眼睛。
column4: 夜鹰是夜鹰目夜鹰科鸟类的通称。头较扁平，喙极短小，但嘴裂宽阔，有发达的嘴须或特化成须状的羽毛；两翼尖长或短圆；尾较长，平尾或圆尾，有的种类尾羽特型延长；脚短，并趾型。雌雄同色，体色多以褐色、白色、黑色和棕色为主，斑驳似猫头鹰。夜鹰遍布热带和温带地区（新西兰、南美最南部和大部分海岛除外）。多数种类栖息于靠近草原和沙漠的森林边缘带，少数种类栖息于森林，在黎明、黄昏和夜晚活动。以昆虫为食。其繁殖期与昆虫的季节性繁盛期保持一致，在温带地区为暮春和夏季，在热带通常为潮湿季节末期。 [6]窝卵数1-2枚；白色或浅黄色，常带斑。孵化期16-22天，雏鸟留巢期16-30天。夜鹰以它们奇特的鸣声出名。由于白天栖息时一动不动，再加上伪装性很强的体羽，它们很难被发现。对于这种行踪隐秘的鸟，流传着许多迷信的说法，如苏拉威西岛北部的环颈毛腿夜鹰，当地人相信这种鸟会啄出人的眼睛。

column3: 北美星鸦的体态特征包括体长30-38厘米，体重在130-200克之间。成鸟的额、头顶至枕部为黑褐色或紫黑色，头侧和眼周暗褐色并具有黄白色纵纹。飞羽和尾羽为黑褐色，尾除中央尾羽外均具有黄白色端斑，外侧尾羽端斑逐渐增大，最外侧尾羽几乎全为白色。颜和尾下覆羽为白色，其余体羽均为暗褐色，满布黄白色星斑。虹膜为褐色，喙和脚为黑色。
column4: 北美星鸦的体态特征包括体长30-38厘米，体重在130-200克之间。成鸟的额、头顶至枕部为黑褐色或紫黑色，头侧和眼周暗褐色并具有黄白色纵纹。飞羽和尾羽为黑褐色，尾除中央尾羽外均具有黄白色端斑，外侧尾羽端斑逐渐增大，最外侧尾羽几乎全为白色。颜和尾下覆羽为白色，其余体羽均为暗褐色，满布黄白色星斑。虹膜为褐色，喙和脚为黑色。

column3: The largest nuthatch in North America, with distinctive white face, black cap, and blue-gray upperparts. Also note rusty lower belly and undertail coverts. Females have a slightly paler crown than males. Fairly common and widespread, usually in mature woodlands with large trees. Creeps along tree trunks and branches, often upside-down. Sometimes joins mixed flocks with other songbirds. Visits feeders. Listen for insistent yammering calls. Some subtle variation across range, mainly in the darkness of the sides and back, width of the black crown, and vocalizations.
column4: 北美最大的胡桃雀，有独特的白色脸、黑色帽和蓝灰色上半身。也注意生锈的下腹部和尾下盖。雌性的冠色比雄性略浅。相当普遍和广泛，通常在有大树的成熟林地中。沿树干和树枝爬行，通常是倒立的。有时加入混合鸟群与其他鸣禽。访问喂食器。倾听持续的咆哮呼叫。在整个范围内有一些微妙的变化，主要是在侧面和背部的黑暗，黑冠的宽度和发声。

column3: The common oriole in the eastern U.S., wintering to northern South America. Adult males are stunning: bright orange with a black head and bold white wingbar. Females vary from yellowish to bright orange below, often with blotchy black on the head. Breeds in deciduous trees in open woodlands, forest edges, orchards, riversides, parks, and backyards. Listen for rich whistled song. Visits feeders with nectar and fruits. Females can be very difficult to distinguish from Bullock's Oriole, and hybrids do occur. Baltimore is usually brightest on the breast, not the face.
column4: 美国东部常见的黄鹂，越冬到南美洲北部。成年雄鸟令人惊叹:明亮的橙色，黑色的头部和醒目的白色翼条。雌性从下面的淡黄色到亮橙色不等，通常头部有黑色斑点。在开阔林地、森林边缘、果园、河边、公园和后院的落叶树中繁殖。聆听丰富的口哨歌曲。带着花蜜和水果拜访喂食者。很难将雌性与布洛克黄鹂区分开来，杂交也会发生。巴尔的摩通常是胸部最亮，而不是脸部。

column3: Rather slender, long-tailed oriole. Adult males are orange with a black mask and throat and obvious white shoulder patch. Variable color intensity: Eastern birds (from Texas to the Yucatan Peninsula) are brighter orange; Western birds are more yellow. Females are dull yellow with a grayish wash on the upperparts and sides. Immature males are similar to females, but brighter yellow and with a black throat. Occurs in open woodlands and scrub in the southwestern U.S. and Mexico. Often seen in parks and neighborhoods, with an affinity for palm trees. Visits feeders with nectar and fruits. Most similar to female Orchard Oriole, but note the longer, more decurved bill.
column4: 相当纤细，长尾黄鹂。成年雄性是橙色的，有黑色的面罩和喉咙，明显的白色肩部斑块。不同的颜色强度:东部鸟类(从德克萨斯州到尤卡坦半岛)是明亮的橙色;西方的鸟更黄。雌性为暗黄色，上部和两侧有灰白色。未成熟的雄性与雌性相似，但颜色更亮，喉咙更黑。产于美国西南部和墨西哥的开阔林地和灌木丛中。经常在公园和社区看到，对棕榈树有亲和力。带着花蜜和水果拜访喂食者。最类似于雌性果园黄鹂，但注意更长，更弯曲的喙。

column3: Small, slender oriole. Adult males are a unique rich chestnut-brown color with a black head. Females are dull yellow-green with white wingbars. Immature males are similar to females, but with a black throat and mask. Breeds in open woodlands, river edges, pastures with scattered trees, and brushy orchards. Visits feeders with nectar and fruits. Departs breeding grounds early and heads to wintering grounds in Mexico and Central America, where it can be found in any open or wooded habitat. Compare with female Hooded Oriole, which is larger and longer-tailed and has a narrower, more curved bill.
column4: 小而细长的黄鹂。成年雄性是独特的栗色，头部为黑色。雌性是暗黄绿色的，有白色的翼条。未成熟的雄性与雌性相似，但有黑色的喉咙和面具。在开阔的林地、河边、有零星树木的牧场和灌木丛生的果园中繁殖。带着花蜜和水果拜访喂食者。提前离开繁殖地，前往墨西哥和中美洲的越冬地，在那里，它可以在任何开阔或树木繁茂的栖息地找到。与雌鸟相比，雌鸟体型更大，尾巴更长，喙更窄，更弯曲。

column3: This black-and-yellow oriole prefers dry habitats where yuccas are plentiful, often on steep hillsides. Males are particularly striking; look for the black back, head, and breast, bright white wingbar, and yellow shoulder. Females are duller grayish above, often retaining some black on the breast and throat. Young birds are quite dull; look for dull mottled streaking on the back. Listen for its whistled song, a rather fast series of clear notes. Feeds on insects, nectar, and fruit. Occurs from the southwestern U.S. to Oaxaca, where it can be found in mixed pine-oak woodland as well as dry desert hillsides.
column4: 这种黑黄黄鹂喜欢干燥的栖息地，那里有大量的丝兰，通常在陡峭的山坡上。雄性尤其引人注目;寻找黑色的背部、头部和胸部，亮白色的翼条和黄色的肩膀。雌性在上面是暗淡的灰色，通常在乳房和喉咙保留一些黑色。小鸟很迟钝;寻找背部暗淡的斑驳条纹。听它吹口哨的歌声，一连串相当快的清晰音符。以昆虫、花蜜和水果为食。产于美国西南部至瓦哈卡州，可在混合松橡树林地和干燥的沙漠山坡上发现。

column3: Secretive warbler that lacks vibrant colors, but compensates with an enormous voice. Olive-brown above with black streaks on white breast and bold white eyering. Orange central crown stripe bordered by black on either side. Forages for insects by walking along branches and on the ground with exaggerated footsteps and bobbing gait. Breeds primarily in areas with extensive deciduous or mixed forest. Winters primarily in Middle America and the Caribbean, where it can be quiet and difficult to detect. On the breeding grounds, listen for its loud song that builds in volume: “tea-cher, TEA-cher, TEA-CHER!”; also gives a sharp, high-pitched, metallic chip year-round. Possible to confuse with thrushes, but smaller, and walks instead of hops.
column4: 神秘的莺，缺乏鲜艳的颜色，但用巨大的声音弥补。上面是橄榄色，白色胸脯上有黑色条纹和醒目的白色眼线。橙色中央皇冠条纹边界的黑色在任何一方。以夸张的脚步和摆动的步态在树枝和地面上行走，觅食昆虫。主要在有广泛的落叶林或混交林的地区繁殖。冬季主要在中美洲和加勒比海地区，那里很安静，很难被发现。在繁殖地，听着它响亮的歌声，音量越来越大:“茶cher，茶cher，茶cher !”也给尖锐，高音调，金属芯片全年。可能与画眉混淆，但更小，走路而不是跳跃。

column3: Large and conspicuous, gray-brown bird of saltwater habitats. Strictly coastal; rarely seen on inland lakes. Very long bill with pouch for scooping up fish. Forages mainly by diving on fish from above. Frequently cues into fishing activity looking for handouts. Often flies in long lines close to water's surface.
column4: 大而显眼的灰棕色咸水鸟。严格沿海;很少在内陆湖泊见到。非常长的喙和用来捞鱼的袋。主要靠从上面潜水捕食鱼来觅食。经常去钓鱼活动寻找施舍。通常在靠近水面的地方排成一长串。

column3: Extremely large and conspicuous. White with black wingtips. Very long, orange bill with pouch for scooping up fish. Forages in flocks, swimming together to concentrate fish. Often soars in flocks, infrequently flapping, during migration and when traveling between feeding sites.
column4: 极其巨大和显眼的。白色带黑色翼尖。很长，橙色的喙，有用来舀鱼的袋。成群觅食，一起游来集中鱼群。经常在鸟群中飞翔，在迁徙和觅食地点之间旅行时不经常拍打。

column3: Drab grayish-brown flycatcher found in deciduous and mixed forests and edges. Nondescript overall with two pale wingbars; bill is usually mostly dark with only limited orange at the base. Note very long wings and larger size than Empidonax flycatchers. Typically seen on a high perch, occasionally sallying out to snatch an insect. Essentially identical to Eastern Wood-Pewee; averages darker overall with weaker upper wingbar, but reliably distinguished only by voice. Listen for buzzy tones, especially the “BREeerr” song.
column4: 灰褐色的捕蝇草，见于落叶和混交林及其边缘。一般的整体有两个苍白的翼杆;Bill通常是深色的，只有底部有少量的橙色。注意非常长的翅膀和比emidonax捕蝇器更大的尺寸。通常在高处看到，偶尔会跳出来抓昆虫。本质上与Eastern Wood-Pewee相同;平均整体颜色较深，上翼杆较弱，但只能通过声音可靠地区分。倾听嗡嗡的声音，尤其是“BREeerr”这首歌。

column3: A medium-sized, sooty-black flycatcher. Marked geographic variation: most North American birds have dull wings and a clean white belly, while South American birds have bright white edging on wing feathers and much more limited white on the belly. Typically seen singly or in pairs, usually sitting conspicuously on a low perch. Frequently pumps tail up and down. Often near water; especially tied to fast-flowing, rocky streams in South America.
column4: 一只中等大小的煤黑捕蝇蝇。明显的地理差异:大多数北美鸟类的翅膀暗淡，腹部呈白色，而南美鸟类的翅膀羽毛边缘呈明亮的白色，腹部的白色要有限得多。通常单独或成对出现，通常显眼地坐在低矮的栖木上。经常上下摆动尾巴。常靠近水的;尤其是与南美洲湍急的岩石溪流有关。

column3: 体态修长，羽色单调的鸣禽，常栖于开阔乡村。上体呈灰色，下体具纵纹，但有些个体在繁殖季缺少纵纹。与外貌相似（但无亲缘关系）的其他雀类的区别在于其具有纤细的喙，长腿及瘦长的身形。常在地面上急促地走动，上下摆动尾巴。成群从上空飞过或从荒地惊飞时常能听到其叫声。留意其飞行中白色的外侧尾羽。
column4: 体态修长，羽色单调的鸣禽，常栖于开阔乡村。上体呈灰色，下体具纵纹，但有些个体在繁殖季缺少纵纹。与外貌相似（但无亲缘关系）的其他雀类的区别在于其具有纤细的喙，长腿及瘦长的身形。常在地面上急促地走动，上下摆动尾巴。成群从上空飞过或从荒地惊飞时常能听到其叫声。留意其飞行中白色的外侧尾羽。

column3: Cryptic night bird, more often heard than seen. Listen for namesake song, a whistled "whip-poor-WILL," repeated endlessly. Found in forests, often with a mixture of pines and deciduous trees with open areas nearby for foraging. Forages for flying insects from the ground at night. Intricately patterned with gray, brown, and black. Similar to Chuck-will's-widow but with smaller head and shorter wings and tail. Eastern and Mexican Whip-poor-wills were recently split into separate species; they differ mainly in voice and do not overlap in range.
column4: 神秘的夜鸟，多听少见。听一听同名的歌曲，那首口哨般的“whip-poor-WILL”，没完没了地重复着。生长于森林中，常与松树和落叶树混合生长，附近有开阔的觅食区。晚上从地上觅食飞虫。有灰色、棕色和黑色的复杂图案。类似于查克威尔的寡妇，但头更小，翅膀和尾巴更短。东部和墨西哥的鞭-贫-遗嘱最近分裂成不同的物种;它们主要在声音上不同，在音域上不重叠。

column3: Chunky black-and-white seabird with very thick yellow and red bill. Orange feet. Named for the spikelike protrusion of black skin above the eye. Nonbreeding and immature birds have a darker gray face and duller bill. Nests in colonies on rocky islands or cliffs in Canada and Alaska; winters on open ocean. Only other seabird in range with such a thick bill is Tufted Puffin, which has an entirely black body.
column4: 粗壮的黑白相间的海鸟，有非常厚的黄色和红色的嘴。橙色的脚。因眼睛上方黑色皮肤的尖刺状突起而得名。非繁殖和未成熟的鸟有深灰色的脸和暗淡的喙。在加拿大和阿拉斯加的岩石岛屿或悬崖上筑巢;冬天在公海上。在活动范围内，其他拥有如此厚喙的海鸟只有簇毛海雀，它的身体是完全黑色的。

column3: Large, glossy-black bird with a wedge-shaped tail. Larger than a crow with a longer, thicker bill. Distinctive shape in flight, with rather long, swept-back wings and long tail. Note smoother, steadier wingbeats compared with faster, choppier wingbeats of crows. Extensive range throughout the Northern Hemisphere. Found in a wide variety of habitats, including desert, coniferous forest, coastlines, sagebrush, tundra, and grasslands. Often solitary or in pairs, but can gather in small groups. Typical call is a loud, guttural croak, but makes an astonishing variety of other strange noises. Compare with Chihuahuan Raven in the southwestern U.S. and Mexico, and with various large, all-dark crows and ravens in Europe and Asia.
column4: 大的，有光泽的黑色鸟，尾巴呈楔形。比乌鸦大，喙长而粗。飞行时形状独特，有相当长的后掠翼和长长的尾巴。注意更平滑、更稳定的翅膀拍击，而乌鸦的翅膀拍击则更快、更起伏。广泛分布于整个北半球。发现在各种各样的栖息地，包括沙漠，针叶林，海岸线，山艾树，苔原和草原。通常是单独的或成对的，但也可以聚集成小群。典型的叫声是响亮的喉音，但也会发出各种奇怪的声音。比较一下美国西南部和墨西哥的奇瓦瓦渡鸦，以及欧洲和亚洲的各种大型、全黑的乌鸦和渡鸦。

column3: Typical, heavy-billed raven, but with the unusual addition of a white wedge on the back of the neck. Flight is powerful and heavy; sometimes soars. Found in a variety of habitats in rocky or mountainous country. Usually in pairs or small flocks; feeds by walking along the ground. Call is a rough “krrraw.” Larger than Pied Crow, with a heavier bill and much less white. Similar to Thick-billed Raven, but shorter-tailed, smaller-billed, and with a more extensive white patch on the neck.
column4: 典型的重嘴乌鸦，但脖子后面有一个不寻常的白色楔形。飞行是有力而沉重的;有时会飙升。分布在岩石或山区的各种栖息地。通常成对或小群的;沿着地面行走进食。Call是一个粗糙的“krrraw”。比花衣乌鸦大，嘴更重，白色少得多。与厚嘴乌鸦相似，但尾巴短，嘴小，脖子上有更大的白色斑块。

column3: Adult males are striking and distinctive: mostly glossy black with bright orange flashes on the wings, tail, and sides. Females and young males are duller gray and olive with yellow patches instead of orange. Habitually flicks and fans tail while foraging for insects. Breeds in mature deciduous forests, often near water. Migrants can be found in any wooded habitat. Fairly extensive winter range throughout most of Middle America, the Caribbean, and northern South America. Song is extremely variable.
column4: 成年雄蝶十分引人注目和与众不同:大部分是光滑的黑色，在翅膀、尾巴和侧面有亮橙色的闪光。雌性和年轻的雄性是暗灰色和橄榄色，有黄色斑块而不是橙色。觅食昆虫时习惯性地轻拍和扇动尾巴。在成熟的落叶林中繁殖，通常靠近水。在任何树木繁茂的栖息地都能找到候鸟。冬季分布相当广泛，遍布中美洲、加勒比海和南美洲北部的大部分地区。歌曲是非常多变的。

column3: A huge, ground-dwelling cuckoo, bane of coyotes. Streaky brown overall with a very long tail and short, shaggy crest. Surprisingly iridescent in good light, with purple and green tones on wings and tail. Usually seen on the ground in dry desert habitats with patches of thick vegetation; sometimes perches on fences or rocks, especially when singing. Runs swiftly after large insects, lizards, and other prey. Unmistakable in most of range; overlaps locally with Lesser Roadrunner in west Mexico. Greater has more streaking on the throat and center of breast, instead of clear buffy on Lesser. Listen for very low-pitched cooing song.
column4: 巨大的地面布谷鸟，土狼的天敌。整体呈条纹棕色，尾巴很长，冠短而蓬松。在良好的光线下，令人惊讶的彩虹色，翅膀和尾巴上有紫色和绿色的色调。通常在干燥的沙漠栖息地的地面上看到，有厚厚的植被斑块;有时栖息在篱笆或岩石上，尤其是唱歌的时候。迅速追赶大型昆虫、蜥蜴和其他猎物。在大部分范围内无误的;与墨西哥西部的小跑鹃在当地重叠。大的在喉咙和胸部中心有更多的条纹，而小的有清晰的灰褐色。听非常低音调的咕咕歌。

column3: Black-masked bandit of open areas with some bushes and trees. Bold black, white, and gray pattern is distinctive; also note stout hooked bill. Usually seen singly or in pairs, often perched conspicuously on a treetop or utility wire. Fairly widespread in southern and western North America, but never abundant, and declining over much of range. Carnivorous habits make shrikes unique among passerines; they feed on rodents and small birds. Undulating flight; watch for white patches in the wings. May overlap with Northern Shrike in winter; Loggerhead is slightly smaller, darker, and lacks white around the eye.
column4: 黑面强盗，出没于灌木和树木的开阔地带。醒目的黑、白、灰图案与众不同;也注意粗壮钩嘴。通常单个或成对出现，经常显眼地栖息在树梢或电线上。在北美南部和西部相当广泛，但从未丰富，并且在大部分范围内逐渐减少。食肉习性使伯劳鸟在雀形目中独一无二;它们以啮齿动物和小鸟为食。起伏的;注意翅膀上的白斑。冬季可能与伯劳鸟重叠;红海龟略小，颜色更深，眼睛周围没有白色。

column3: Thrush-sized bird; pale gray overall with black mask. In flight, watch for white patches in the wings. In areas of overlap, compare with other gray shrikes. Inhabits open habitats with scattered vegetation, from open forests to bogs and brushy meadows. Often seen on prominent perches, including power lines and short treetops, that offer perfect vantages for from which to spot prey. Carnivorous habits make shrikes unique among passerines, feeding on rodents and small birds. Vocalizations include bright short liquid trills and “gargling” phrases, often strung together into a repetitive song.
column4: 鸫科鸟;整体为浅灰色，面罩为黑色。在飞行中，注意翅膀上的白斑。在重叠的区域，与其他灰伯劳比较。栖息在植被分散的开阔栖息地，从开阔的森林到沼泽和灌木丛生的草地。它们经常出现在显眼的栖息处，包括电力线和短树梢，为发现猎物提供了完美的优势。食肉习性使伯劳鸟在雀形目动物中独一无二，以啮齿动物和小鸟为食。发声包括明亮的短液体颤音和“漱口”短语，通常串在一起形成一首重复的歌曲。

column3: One of North America's most sought-after sparrows due to its small breeding range and secretive habits. Breeds in extensive tall grasslands; winters in similar grassy habitats. Pale tan overall with crisp black streaking on breast. Warm buffy face is brightest to the rear of the eyebrow and broken up by thin black markings. Easy to see when perched, singing its high-pitched tinkling trill; otherwise shy and difficult to locate. Population is declining due to development of prime grassland breeding habitat.
column4: 北美最受欢迎的麻雀之一，因为它的繁殖范围小，习性隐秘。在广泛的高草原上繁殖;在相似的草木栖息地过冬。整体呈浅褐色，胸部有清晰的黑色条纹。暖色调的脸在眉后最亮，中间有细小的黑色斑纹。栖息时容易看见，唱着它的高亢丁当的颤音;否则怕羞，难以定位。由于主要草原繁殖生境的发展，种群数量呈下降趋势。

column3: Evidence that not all sparrows are dull, Black-throated Sparrow is a sharp-dressed denizen of open, shrubby desert. Gray-brown overall with distinctive black-and-white face pattern, dark tail with white corners. Streakier juvenile shows a hint of adult's face pattern, especially white eyebrow. Typically found on or near the ground in pairs or small flocks. Tinkling song with short trills and chips.
column4: 并非所有的麻雀都是迟钝的，黑喉麻雀是一种穿着锋利的居民，生活在开阔的灌木丛沙漠中。整体灰褐色，有独特的黑白花纹，深色尾巴，白色角。裸眼的青少年表现出成年人的面部特征，尤其是白色的眉毛。通常成对或小群地出现在地面或靠近地面的地方。带有短颤音和脆片的叮当作响的歌曲。

column3: Small, drab sparrow of scrubby areas in western North America, from Alaska to Mexico. Slender and long-tailed, similar in shape and size to Chipping and Clay-colored Sparrows. Note the pale gray nape, pale lores, and plain facial pattern. Breeds mostly in sagebrush; winters in loose flocks in any brushy or grassy area, often with other sparrows. Song is a long series of buzzy, reedy notes mixed with trills; tones and long duration of song are unique.
column4: 北美洲西部灌木丛生地区的灰褐色小麻雀，从阿拉斯加到墨西哥。细长的和长尾的，在形状和大小上类似于碎裂的和粘土色的麻雀。注意浅灰色的颈背，浅灰色的腿，和普通的面部图案。品种主要在山艾灌木;冬季在任何灌木或草地上散居，通常与其他麻雀在一起。歌曲是一长串混杂着颤音的嗡嗡、尖锐的音符;音调和长时间的歌唱是独一无二的。

column3: Small, slender, and incredibly cute sparrow. Plain grayish breast, rusty cap, and black eyeline in breeding season. Not as bright in winter, but still shows a brown cap and dark eyeline. Juveniles are extensively streaky. Common and widespread throughout most of North America. Usually found in open woodlands, scrubby areas, or even in suburban settings. Often gathers in flocks in fall and winter. Visits feeders. Frequently heard singing a fairly dry trill. Compare with similar Clay-colored, American Tree, and Brewer's sparrows, but look for Chipping Sparrow's gray rump and dark eyeline.
column4: 又小又苗条又无比可爱的麻雀。在繁殖季节，胸部浅灰色，帽部生锈，有黑色的眼线。在冬天没有那么明亮，但仍然显示出棕色的帽子和黑色的眼线。幼鱼有广泛的条纹。在北美大部分地区普遍分布。通常生长在开阔的林地、灌木丛地区，甚至郊区。常在秋冬成群聚集。访问喂食器。经常听到唱相当干涩的颤音。与类似的粘土色麻雀，美国树麻雀和布鲁尔麻雀相比，但要注意奇平麻雀的灰色臀部和黑色眼线。

column3: Small, slender sparrow with short bill and long, narrow tail. Subtly patterned with pale gray and buff overall. Face usually looks crisp and clean. Most similar to Chipping and Field Sparrows, but note combination of white supercilium, plain lores, and buffy rump. Song is a series of low, insect-like buzzes.
